jobs.name: Delete Records from Tables that do not support Delta Load
Execute Oracle EBS Object Centric Eventlog Tasks

transformations.name: Delete Records from Tables that do not support Delta Load
transformations.statement:
DELETE FROM AME_APPROVAL_GROUPS;      -- Primary Key can change

transformations.name: Create Table _EVENTLOG (run once)
transformations.statement:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS "_EVENTLOG";

CREATE TABLE "_EVENTLOG" (
     "EVENT_ID" VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL
    ,"ACTIVITY_EN" VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN" VARCHAR(200)
    ,"ACTIVITY_NL" VARCHAR(200)
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL" VARCHAR(200)
    ,"EVENTTIME" DATETIME NOT NULL
    ,"_SORTING" INT
    ,"PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID" VARCHAR(200)
    ,"USER_ID" VARCHAR(50)   
    ,"USER_TYPE" VARCHAR(10)
    ,"USER_NAME" VARCHAR(100)
    -- Change Attributes
    ,"CHANGED_FROM" VARCHAR (200)
    ,"CHANGED_TO" VARCHAR(200)
    ,"CHANGED_FROM_FLOAT" FLOAT
    ,"CHANGED_TO_FLOAT" FLOAT
    -- Additional event specific attributes
    ,"AMOUNT" FLOAT
    ,"QUANTITY" FLOAT
    ,"USER_APPROVAL_LIMIT" FLOAT
    ,"NOTE" VARCHAR(4000)
);

ALTER TABLE "_EVENTLOG" ADD UNIQUE("EVENT_ID") ENABLED;

transformations.name: Create Table _LINK_EVENT_ID_OBJECT_ID (run once)
Create Tables Link between Object ID's (run once)
Insert Link Object Id between PR and PO
transformations.statement:
INSERT INTO "_LINK_PR_PO" (
     "OBJECT_ID_1"
    ,"OBJECT_ID_2"
    ,"_CREATION_DATE"
)
-- FROM STANDARD TABLE
SELECT DISTINCT 'PR_'||CAST(PRLA.REQUISITION_HEADER_ID AS VARCHAR(100)) AS "OBJECT_ID_1"
  , 'PO_'||CAST(PDA.PO_HEADER_ID AS VARCHAR(100)) AS "OBJECT_ID_2"
  , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
FROM "PO_DISTRIBUTIONS_ALL" PDA
JOIN "PO_REQ_DISTRIBUTIONS_ALL" PRDA ON 1=1
    AND PDA.REQ_DISTRIBUTION_ID = PRDA.DISTRIBUTION_ID
JOIN "PO_REQUISITION_LINES_ALL" PRLA ON 1=1
    AND PRDA.REQUISITION_LINE_ID = PRLA.REQUISITION_LINE_ID
JOIN PO_HEADERS_ALL PHA ON 1=1
    AND PDA.PO_HEADER_ID = PHA.PO_HEADER_ID
WHERE 1=1
    AND PDA.REQ_DISTRIBUTION_ID IS NOT NULL
    AND PDA.PO_RELEASE_ID IS NULL  -- otherwise it is linked to a Blanket Release and NOT to a PO
    AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1
                     FROM "_LINK_PR_PO" L
                     WHERE 1=1
                     AND 'PR_'||CAST(PRLA.REQUISITION_HEADER_ID AS VARCHAR(100)) = L."OBJECT_ID_1"
                     AND 'PO_'||CAST(PDA.PO_HEADER_ID AS VARCHAR(100)) = L."OBJECT_ID_2"
                   ) 
UNION
-- FROM ARCHIVE TABLE
SELECT DISTINCT 'PR_'||CAST(PRLA.REQUISITION_HEADER_ID AS VARCHAR(100)) AS "OBJECT_ID_1"
  , 'PO_'||CAST(PDAA.PO_HEADER_ID AS VARCHAR(100)) AS "OBJECT_ID_2"
  , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
FROM "PO_DISTRIBUTIONS_ARCHIVE_ALL" PDAA
JOIN "PO_REQ_DISTRIBUTIONS_ALL" PRDA ON 1=1
    AND PDAA.REQ_DISTRIBUTION_ID = PRDA.DISTRIBUTION_ID
JOIN "PO_REQUISITION_LINES_ALL" PRLA ON 1=1
    AND PRDA.REQUISITION_LINE_ID = PRLA.REQUISITION_LINE_ID
JOIN PO_HEADERS_ALL PHA ON 1=1
    AND PDAA.PO_HEADER_ID = PHA.PO_HEADER_ID
WHERE 1=1
    AND PDAA.REQ_DISTRIBUTION_ID IS NOT NULL
    AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1
                     FROM "_LINK_PR_PO" L
                     WHERE 1=1
                     AND 'PR_'||CAST(PRLA.REQUISITION_HEADER_ID AS VARCHAR(100)) = L."OBJECT_ID_1"
                     AND 'PO_'||CAST(PDAA.PO_HEADER_ID AS VARCHAR(100)) = L."OBJECT_ID_2"
                   ) 
;

                  ) 
;

transformations.name: Insert Link Object Id between PO and GR
transformations.statement:
INSERT INTO "_LINK_PO_GR" (
     "OBJECT_ID_1"
    ,"OBJECT_ID_2"
    ,"_CREATION_DATE"
)
SELECT DISTINCT 'PO_'||CAST(RT.PO_HEADER_ID AS VARCHAR(100)) AS "OBJECT_ID_1"
    , 'GR_'||CAST(RT.SHIPMENT_HEADER_ID AS VARCHAR(100)) AS "OBJECT_ID_2"
    , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
FROM "RCV_TRANSACTIONS" RT
JOIN "RCV_SHIPMENT_HEADERS" RSH ON 1=1
  AND RT."SHIPMENT_HEADER_ID" = RSH."SHIPMENT_HEADER_ID"
WHERE 1=1
    AND RT.PO_HEADER_ID IS NOT NULL
    AND RT.PO_RELEASE_ID IS NULL -- Otherwise it is linked to a Blanket Release and NOT to a PO
    AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1
                     FROM "_LINK_PO_GR" L
                     WHERE 1=1
                     AND 'PO_'||CAST(RT.PO_HEADER_ID AS VARCHAR(100)) = L."OBJECT_ID_1"
                     AND 'GR_'||CAST(RT.SHIPMENT_HEADER_ID AS VARCHAR(100)) = L."OBJECT_ID_2"
                   ) 
;

transformations.name: Insert Link Object Id between BA and SU
transformations.statement:
INSERT INTO "_LINK_BA_SU" (
     "OBJECT_ID_1"
    ,"OBJECT_ID_2"
    ,"_CREATION_DATE"
)
SELECT DISTINCT 'BA_'||CAST(IEB.EXT_BANK_ACCOUNT_ID AS VARCHAR(100)) AS "OBJECT_ID_1"
  , 'SU_'||CAST(APS.VENDOR_ID AS VARCHAR(100)) AS "OBJECT_ID_2"
  , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
FROM IBY_EXT_BANK_ACCOUNTS IEB
JOIN IBY_PMT_INSTR_USES_ALL IPI ON 1=1
  AND IPI.INSTRUMENT_ID = IEB.EXT_BANK_ACCOUNT_ID
JOIN IBY_EXTERNAL_PAYEES_ALL IEPA ON 1=1
  AND IEPA.EXT_PAYEE_ID = IPI.EXT_PMT_PARTY_ID
JOIN AP_SUPPLIERS APS ON 1=1
  AND IEPA.PAYEE_PARTY_ID = APS.PARTY_ID
WHERE 1=1
   AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1
                    FROM "_LINK_BA_SU" L
                    WHERE 1=1
                    AND 'BA_'||CAST(IEB.EXT_BANK_ACCOUNT_ID AS VARCHAR(100)) = L."OBJECT_ID_1"
                    AND 'SU_'||CAST(APS.VENDOR_ID AS VARCHAR(100)) = L."OBJECT_ID_2"
                  ) 
;

transformations.name: Insert Event: PR - Create Requisition
transformations.statement:
INSERT INTO "_EVENTLOG" (
    "EVENT_ID"
    ,"ACTIVITY_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_NL" 
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL" 
    ,"EVENTTIME"
    ,"USER_ID"
    ,"PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID"
)
SELECT 'EBS_PRHA_'||PRHA.REQUISITION_HEADER_ID||'_CREATE-REQ' AS "EVENT_ID"
    , 'Create Requisition' AS "ACTIVITY_EN"
    , 'Create Requisition Header' AS "ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN"
    , 'Aanmaken Bestelaanvraag' AS "ACTIVITY_NL"
    , 'Aanmaken Bestelaanvraag Koptekst' AS "ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL"
    , PRHA."CREATION_DATE" AS "EVENTTIME"
    , PRHA."CREATED_BY" AS "USER_ID"
    , 'PR_'||PRHA.REQUISITION_HEADER_ID AS "PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID"
FROM PO_REQUISITION_HEADERS_ALL PRHA
WHERE 1=1
    AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1
                    FROM "_EVENTLOG" EL
                    WHERE 1=1
                        AND EL."EVENT_ID" = 'EBS_PRHA_'||PRHA.REQUISITION_HEADER_ID||'_CREATE-REQ'
                    )
;

transformations.name: Insert Event: PR - Requisition Actions
transformations.statement:
INSERT INTO "_EVENTLOG" (
    "EVENT_ID"
    ,"ACTIVITY_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_NL" 
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL" 
    ,"EVENTTIME"
    ,"USER_ID"
    ,"PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID"
    --
    ,"NOTE"
)
SELECT 'EBS_PAH_'||COALESCE(PAH.OBJECT_ID,0)||'-'||COALESCE(PAH.SEQUENCE_NUM,0)||'-'||COALESCE(PAH.OBJECT_TYPE_CODE,'')||'-'||COALESCE(PAH.OBJECT_SUB_TYPE_CODE,'')||'_ACTION-REQUISITION' AS ACTIVITY_ID
, CASE PAH.ACTION_CODE
       WHEN 'APPROVE' THEN 'Approve Requisition'
       WHEN 'CANCEL' THEN 'Cancel Requisition' 
       WHEN 'DELEGATE' THEN 'Delegate Requisition'
       WHEN 'FINALLY CLOSE' THEN 'Finally Close Requisition'
       WHEN 'FORWARD' THEN 'Forward Requisition'
       WHEN 'IMPORT' THEN 'Import Requisition'
       WHEN 'NO ACTION' THEN 'No Action Requisition'
       WHEN 'REJECT' THEN 'Reject Requisition'
       WHEN 'RESERVE' THEN 'Reserve Requisition'     
       WHEN 'RETURN' THEN 'Return Requisition'     
       WHEN 'SUBMIT' THEN 'Submit Requisition'
       WHEN 'SUBMIT CHANGE' THEN 'Submit Change Requisition'
       WHEN 'UNRESERVE' THEN 'Unreserve Requisition'
       WHEN 'WITHDRAW' THEN 'Withdraw Requisition'
       WHEN 'ADJUST' THEN 'Adjust Requisition'
       WHEN 'QUESTION' THEN 'Request Information about Requisition'
       WHEN 'ANSWER' THEN 'Provide Information about Requisition'
       ELSE PAH.ACTION_CODE||' Requisition'
       END AS ACTIVITY_EN
, CASE PAH.ACTION_CODE
       WHEN 'APPROVE' THEN 'Approve Requisition'
       WHEN 'CANCEL' THEN 'Cancel Requisition' 
       WHEN 'DELEGATE' THEN 'Delegate Requisition'
       WHEN 'FINALLY CLOSE' THEN 'Finally Close Requisition'
       WHEN 'FORWARD' THEN 'Forward Requisition'
       WHEN 'IMPORT' THEN 'Import Requisition'
       WHEN 'NO ACTION' THEN 'No Action Requisition'
       WHEN 'REJECT' THEN 'Reject Requisition'
       WHEN 'RESERVE' THEN 'Reserve Requisition'     
       WHEN 'RETURN' THEN 'Return Requisition'     
       WHEN 'SUBMIT' THEN 'Submit Requisition'
       WHEN 'SUBMIT CHANGE' THEN 'Submit Change Requisition'
       WHEN 'UNRESERVE' THEN 'Unreserve Requisition'
       WHEN 'WITHDRAW' THEN 'Withdraw Requisition'
       WHEN 'ADJUST' THEN 'Adjust Requisition'
       WHEN 'QUESTION' THEN 'Request Information about Requisition'
       WHEN 'ANSWER' THEN 'Provide Information about Requisition'
       ELSE PAH.ACTION_CODE||' Requisition'
       END AS "ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN"
, CASE PAH.ACTION_CODE
       WHEN 'APPROVE' THEN 'Goedkeuren Bestelaanvraag'
       WHEN 'CANCEL' THEN 'Annuleren Bestelaanvraag' 
       WHEN 'DELEGATE' THEN 'Delegeren Bestelaanvraag'
       WHEN 'FINALLY CLOSE' THEN 'Definitief Afsluiten Bestelaanvraag'
       WHEN 'FORWARD' THEN 'Doorsturen Bestelaanvraag'
       WHEN 'IMPORT' THEN 'Bestelaanvraag Importeren'
       WHEN 'NO ACTION' THEN 'Bestelaanvraag Geen Actie'
       WHEN 'REJECT' THEN 'Afwijzen Bestelaanvraag'
       WHEN 'RESERVE' THEN 'Bestelaanvraag Reserveren'     
       WHEN 'RETURN' THEN 'Retourneren Bestelaanvraag'     
       WHEN 'SUBMIT' THEN 'Versturen Bestelaanvraag'
       WHEN 'SUBMIT CHANGE' THEN 'Versturen Bestelaanvraag Wijziging'
       WHEN 'UNRESERVE' THEN 'Bestelaanvraag Reservering Annuleren'
       WHEN 'WITHDRAW' THEN 'Terugtrekken Bestelaanvraag'
       WHEN 'ADJUST' THEN 'Aanpassen Bestelaanvraag'
       WHEN 'QUESTION' THEN 'Vraag Stellen over Bestelaanvraag'
       WHEN 'ANSWER' THEN 'Vraag Beantwoorden over Bestelaanvraag'
       ELSE PAH.ACTION_CODE||' Bestelaanvraag'
       END AS ACTIVITY_NL
, CASE PAH.ACTION_CODE
       WHEN 'APPROVE' THEN 'Goedkeuren Bestelaanvraag'
       WHEN 'CANCEL' THEN 'Annuleren Bestelaanvraag' 
       WHEN 'DELEGATE' THEN 'Delegeren Bestelaanvraag'
       WHEN 'FINALLY CLOSE' THEN 'Definitief Afsluiten Bestelaanvraag'
       WHEN 'FORWARD' THEN 'Doorsturen Bestelaanvraag'
       WHEN 'IMPORT' THEN 'Bestelaanvraag Importeren'
       WHEN 'NO ACTION' THEN 'Bestelaanvraag Geen Actie'
       WHEN 'REJECT' THEN 'Afwijzen Bestelaanvraag'
       WHEN 'RESERVE' THEN 'Bestelaanvraag Reserveren'     
       WHEN 'RETURN' THEN 'Retourneren Bestelaanvraag'     
       WHEN 'SUBMIT' THEN 'Versturen Bestelaanvraag'
       WHEN 'SUBMIT CHANGE' THEN 'Versturen Bestelaanvraag Wijziging'
       WHEN 'UNRESERVE' THEN 'Bestelaanvraag Reservering Annuleren'
       WHEN 'WITHDRAW' THEN 'Terugtrekken Bestelaanvraag'
       WHEN 'ADJUST' THEN 'Aanpassen Bestelaanvraag'
       WHEN 'QUESTION' THEN 'Vraag Stellen over Bestelaanvraag'
       WHEN 'ANSWER' THEN 'Vraag Beantwoorden over Bestelaanvraag'
       ELSE PAH.ACTION_CODE||' Bestelaanvraag'
       END AS "ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL"
    , PAH.ACTION_DATE AS EVENTTIME
    , CASE WHEN PAH.EMPLOYEE_ID IS NULL 
           THEN PAH.CREATED_BY
           ELSE NVL(X."USER_ID",-1)
      END AS "USER_ID"
    , 'PR_'||PAH."OBJECT_ID" AS "PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID"   -- Requisition Header Id
    , PAH.NOTE
FROM PO_REQUISITION_HEADERS_ALL PRHA
JOIN PO_ACTION_HISTORY PAH ON 1=1
	AND PRHA.REQUISITION_HEADER_ID = PAH.OBJECT_ID
    AND PAH.OBJECT_TYPE_CODE = 'REQUISITION'
    AND PAH.OBJECT_SUB_TYPE_CODE = 'PURCHASE'
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT EMPLOYEE_ID
            , FIRST_VALUE ("USER_ID") OVER(PARTITION BY "EMPLOYEE_ID" ORDER BY "USER_ID" DESC) AS "USER_ID"
            , FIRST_VALUE ("USER_NAME") OVER(PARTITION BY "EMPLOYEE_ID" ORDER BY "USER_ID" DESC) AS "USER_NAME"
            FROM FND_USER
            WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID IS NOT NULL
           ) X ON 1=1
    AND PAH.EMPLOYEE_ID = X.EMPLOYEE_ID
WHERE 1=1
    AND PAH.ACTION_DATE IS NOT NULL
    AND PAH.ACTION_CODE NOT IN ('IMPORT','NO ACTION', 'QUESTION', 'ANSWER', 'RESERVE', 'UNRESERVE' ) 
    AND PAH.ACTION_CODE IS NOT NULL
    AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1
                    FROM "_EVENTLOG" EL
                    WHERE 1=1
                        AND EL."EVENT_ID" = 'EBS_PAH_'||COALESCE(PAH.OBJECT_ID,0)||'-'||COALESCE(PAH.SEQUENCE_NUM,0)||'-'||COALESCE(PAH.OBJECT_TYPE_CODE,'')||'-'||COALESCE(PAH.OBJECT_SUB_TYPE_CODE,'')||'_ACTION-REQUISITION'
                    )
;

transformations.name: Insert Event: PO - Purchase Order Actions
transformations.statement:
INSERT INTO "_EVENTLOG" (
    "EVENT_ID"
    ,"ACTIVITY_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_NL" 
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL" 
    ,"EVENTTIME"
    ,"USER_ID"
    ,"PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID"
    --
    ,"NOTE"
)
SELECT DISTINCT 'EBS_PAH_'||COALESCE(PAH.OBJECT_ID,0)||'-'||COALESCE(PAH.SEQUENCE_NUM,0)||'-'||COALESCE(PAH.OBJECT_TYPE_CODE,'')||'-'||COALESCE(PAH.OBJECT_SUB_TYPE_CODE,'')||'_ACTION-PO' AS "EVENT_ID"
, CASE PAH.ACTION_CODE
       WHEN 'ACCEPT' THEN 'Accept'
       WHEN 'APPROVE' THEN 'Approve'
       WHEN 'CANCEL' THEN 'Cancel'
       WHEN 'CLOSE' THEN 'Close'
       WHEN 'FINALLY CLOSE' THEN 'Finally Close'
       WHEN 'FORWARD' THEN 'Forward'
       WHEN 'DELEGATE' THEN 'Delegate'
       WHEN 'HOLD' THEN 'Hold'
       WHEN 'NO ACTION' THEN 'No Action'
       WHEN 'OPEN' THEN 'Open'
       WHEN 'REJECT' THEN 'Reject'
       WHEN 'RELEASE HOLD' THEN 'Release Hold'
       WHEN 'RESERVE' THEN 'Reserve'
       WHEN 'SIGNED' THEN 'Sign'
       WHEN 'SUBMIT' THEN 'Submit'
       WHEN 'SUBMIT CHANGE' THEN 'Submit Change'
       WHEN 'RESPOND' THEN 'Respond'
       WHEN 'UNRESERVE' THEN 'Unreserve'
       WHEN 'ANSWER' THEN 'Provide Information about'
       WHEN 'APPROVE AND FORWARD' THEN 'Approve and Forward'
       WHEN 'BUYER REJECTED' THEN 'Buyer Rejects'
       WHEN 'FREEZE' THEN 'Freeze'
       WHEN 'QUESTION' THEN 'Request Information about'
       WHEN 'UNFREEZE' THEN 'Unfreeze'
       ELSE NVL(PAH.ACTION_CODE,'Waiting for Action')
       END
       ||' Purchase Order'
       AS ACTIVITY_EN
, CASE PAH.ACTION_CODE
       WHEN 'ACCEPT' THEN 'Accept'
       WHEN 'APPROVE' THEN 'Approve'
       WHEN 'CANCEL' THEN 'Cancel'
       WHEN 'CLOSE' THEN 'Close'
       WHEN 'FINALLY CLOSE' THEN 'Finally Close'
       WHEN 'FORWARD' THEN 'Forward'
       WHEN 'DELEGATE' THEN 'Delegate'
       WHEN 'HOLD' THEN 'Hold'
       WHEN 'NO ACTION' THEN 'No Action'
       WHEN 'OPEN' THEN 'Open'
       WHEN 'REJECT' THEN 'Reject'
       WHEN 'RELEASE HOLD' THEN 'Release Hold'
       WHEN 'RESERVE' THEN 'Reserve'
       WHEN 'SIGNED' THEN 'Sign'
       WHEN 'SUBMIT' THEN 'Submit'
       WHEN 'SUBMIT CHANGE' THEN 'Submit Change'
       WHEN 'RESPOND' THEN 'Respond'
       WHEN 'UNRESERVE' THEN 'Unreserve'
       WHEN 'ANSWER' THEN 'Provide Information about'
       WHEN 'APPROVE AND FORWARD' THEN 'Approve and Forward'
       WHEN 'BUYER REJECTED' THEN 'Buyer Rejects'
       WHEN 'FREEZE' THEN 'Freeze'
       WHEN 'QUESTION' THEN 'Request Information about'
       WHEN 'UNFREEZE' THEN 'Unfreeze'
       ELSE NVL(PAH.ACTION_CODE,'Waiting for Action')
       END
       ||' Purchase Order'
       AS ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN
, CASE PAH.ACTION_CODE
       WHEN 'ACCEPT' THEN 'Accepteren'
       WHEN 'APPROVE' THEN 'Goedkeuren'
       WHEN 'CANCEL' THEN 'Annuleren'
       WHEN 'CLOSE' THEN 'Afsluiten'
       WHEN 'FINALLY CLOSE' THEN 'Definitief Afsluiten'
       WHEN 'FORWARD' THEN 'Doorsturen'
       WHEN 'DELEGATE' THEN 'Delegeren'
       WHEN 'HOLD' THEN 'Blokkeren'
       WHEN 'NO ACTION' THEN 'Geen Actie'
       WHEN 'OPEN' THEN 'Openen'
       WHEN 'REJECT' THEN 'Afwijzen'
       WHEN 'RELEASE HOLD' THEN 'Vrijgeven Blokkade'
       WHEN 'RESERVE' THEN 'Reserveren'
       WHEN 'SIGNED' THEN 'Tekenen'
       WHEN 'SUBMIT' THEN 'Versturen'
       WHEN 'SUBMIT CHANGE' THEN 'Versturen Wijziging'
       WHEN 'RESPOND' THEN 'Beantwoorden'
       WHEN 'UNRESERVE' THEN 'Reservering Annuleren'
       WHEN 'ANSWER' THEN 'Vraag Beantwoorden over'
       WHEN 'APPROVE AND FORWARD' THEN 'Goedkeuren en Doorsturen'
       WHEN 'BUYER REJECTED' THEN 'Afwijzen door Inkoper van'
       WHEN 'FREEZE' THEN 'Bevriezen'
       WHEN 'QUESTION' THEN 'Vraag Stellen over'
       WHEN 'UNFREEZE' THEN 'Opheffen Bevriezing'
       ELSE NVL(PAH.ACTION_CODE,'Wacht op Actie')
       END 
       ||' Inkooporder' AS ACTIVITY_NL
, CASE PAH.ACTION_CODE
       WHEN 'ACCEPT' THEN 'Accepteren'
       WHEN 'APPROVE' THEN 'Goedkeuren'
       WHEN 'CANCEL' THEN 'Annuleren'
       WHEN 'CLOSE' THEN 'Afsluiten'
       WHEN 'FINALLY CLOSE' THEN 'Definitief Afsluiten'
       WHEN 'FORWARD' THEN 'Doorsturen'
       WHEN 'DELEGATE' THEN 'Delegeren'
       WHEN 'HOLD' THEN 'Blokkeren'
       WHEN 'NO ACTION' THEN 'Geen Actie'
       WHEN 'OPEN' THEN 'Openen'
       WHEN 'REJECT' THEN 'Afwijzen'
       WHEN 'RELEASE HOLD' THEN 'Vrijgeven Blokkade'
       WHEN 'RESERVE' THEN 'Reserveren'
       WHEN 'SIGNED' THEN 'Tekenen'
       WHEN 'SUBMIT' THEN 'Versturen'
       WHEN 'SUBMIT CHANGE' THEN 'Versturen Wijziging'
       WHEN 'RESPOND' THEN 'Beantwoorden'
       WHEN 'UNRESERVE' THEN 'Reservering Annuleren'
       WHEN 'ANSWER' THEN 'Vraag Beantwoorden over'
       WHEN 'APPROVE AND FORWARD' THEN 'Goedkeuren en Doorsturen'
       WHEN 'BUYER REJECTED' THEN 'Afwijzen door Inkoper van'
       WHEN 'FREEZE' THEN 'Bevriezen'
       WHEN 'QUESTION' THEN 'Vraag Stellen over'
       WHEN 'UNFREEZE' THEN 'Opheffen Bevriezing'
       ELSE NVL(PAH.ACTION_CODE,'Wacht op Actie')
       END 
       ||' Inkooporder' AS ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL
    , PAH.ACTION_DATE AS EVENTTIME
    , CASE WHEN PAH.EMPLOYEE_ID IS NULL 
           THEN PAH.CREATED_BY
           ELSE NVL(X."USER_ID",-1)
      END AS "USER_ID"
    , 'PO_'||PAH."OBJECT_ID" AS "PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID"  -- Purchase Order Header Id
    --
    , PAH.NOTE
FROM "PO_ACTION_HISTORY" PAH
JOIN "PO_HEADERS_ALL" PHA ON 1=1
	AND PHA."PO_HEADER_ID" = PAH."OBJECT_ID"
	AND PAH."OBJECT_TYPE_CODE" = 'PO' 
	AND PAH."OBJECT_SUB_TYPE_CODE" = 'STANDARD'
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT EMPLOYEE_ID
            , FIRST_VALUE ("USER_ID") OVER(PARTITION BY "EMPLOYEE_ID" ORDER BY "USER_ID" DESC) AS "USER_ID"
            , FIRST_VALUE ("USER_NAME") OVER(PARTITION BY "EMPLOYEE_ID" ORDER BY "USER_ID" DESC) AS "USER_NAME"
            FROM FND_USER
            WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID IS NOT NULL
          ) X ON 1=1
    AND PAH.EMPLOYEE_ID = X.EMPLOYEE_ID
WHERE 1=1
	AND PAH."ACTION_DATE" IS NOT NULL
	AND PAH."ACTION_CODE" IS NOT NULL 
	AND PAH."ACTION_CODE" NOT IN ('NO ACTION','RESERVE', 'UNRESERVE') 
  AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1
                    FROM "_EVENTLOG" EL
                    WHERE 1=1
                        AND EL."EVENT_ID" = 'EBS_PAH_'||COALESCE(PAH.OBJECT_ID,0)||'-'||COALESCE(PAH.SEQUENCE_NUM,0)||'-'||COALESCE(PAH.OBJECT_TYPE_CODE,'')||'-'||COALESCE(PAH.OBJECT_SUB_TYPE_CODE,'')||'_ACTION-PO'
                    )
;

transformations.name: insert Event: PL - Change Quantity
transformations.statement:
INSERT INTO "_EVENTLOG" (
    "EVENT_ID"
    ,"ACTIVITY_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_NL" 
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL" 
    ,"EVENTTIME"
    ,"USER_ID"
    ,"PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID"
    ,"CHANGED_FROM_FLOAT"
    ,"CHANGED_TO_FLOAT"
)
SELECT 'EBS_PLAA_'||LINE_CHANGE.PO_LINE_ID||'-'||LINE_CHANGE.REVISION_NUM||'_CHANGE-QUANTITY' "EVENT_ID"
    , 'Change Quantity' AS "ACTIVITY_EN"
    , 'Change Quantity' AS "ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN"
    , 'Wijzigen Hoeveelheid' AS "ACTIVITY_NL"
    , 'Wijzigen Hoeveelheid' AS "ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL"
    , LINE_CHANGE.LAST_UPDATE_DATE AS "EVENTTIME"
    , LINE_CHANGE.LAST_UPDATED_BY AS USER_ID
    , 'PL_'||LINE_CHANGE.PO_LINE_ID AS "PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID"
    , LINE_CHANGE.PREV_QUANTITY  AS CHANGED_FROM
    , LINE_CHANGE.QUANTITY AS CHANGED_TO
FROM (
      SELECT 
  			PLAA.PO_HEADER_ID
          , PLAA.PO_LINE_ID
          , PLAA.LAST_UPDATE_DATE
          , PLAA.LAST_UPDATED_BY
          , PLAA.REVISION_NUM
          , LAG (REVISION_NUM,1,NULL) OVER (PARTITION BY PLAA.PO_LINE_ID ORDER BY PLAA.REVISION_NUM) PREV_REVISION_NUM
          , PLAA.QUANTITY
          , LAG (QUANTITY,1,NULL) OVER (PARTITION BY PLAA.PO_LINE_ID ORDER BY PLAA.REVISION_NUM) PREV_QUANTITY
      FROM  PO_LINES_ARCHIVE_ALL PLAA
      WHERE 1=1
      ) LINE_CHANGE
JOIN PO_HEADERS_ALL PHA ON 1=1
    AND LINE_CHANGE.PO_HEADER_ID = PHA.PO_HEADER_ID
WHERE 1=1
    AND LINE_CHANGE.PREV_QUANTITY <> LINE_CHANGE.QUANTITY
    AND LINE_CHANGE.QUANTITY <> 0
    AND PHA."TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE" = 'STANDARD'
    AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1
                    FROM "_EVENTLOG" EL
                    WHERE 1=1
                        AND EL."EVENT_ID" = 'EBS_PLAA_'||LINE_CHANGE.PO_LINE_ID||'-'||LINE_CHANGE.REVISION_NUM||'_CHANGE-QUANTITY'
                    )
;

transformations.name: Insert Event: AI - Create Invoice
transformations.statement:
INSERT INTO "_EVENTLOG" (
    "EVENT_ID"
    ,"ACTIVITY_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_NL" 
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL" 
    ,"EVENTTIME"
    ,"USER_ID"
    ,"PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID"
)
SELECT 'EBS_AIA_'||AIA.INVOICE_ID||'_CREATE-INVOICE' AS "EVENT_ID"
    , 'Create Invoice' AS "ACTIVITY_EN"
    , 'Create '||
       CASE WHEN AIA.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE IN ('CREDIT')         THEN 'Credit Memo'
            WHEN AIA.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE IN ('PREPAYMENT')     THEN 'Prepayment'
            WHEN AIA.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE IN ('EXPENSE REPORT') THEN 'Expense Report'
            ELSE 'Invoice'
       END AS "ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN"
    , 'Aanmaken Factuur' AS "ACTIVITY_NL"
    , 'Aanmaken '||
       CASE WHEN AIA.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE IN ('CREDIT')         THEN 'Credit Factuur'
            WHEN AIA.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE IN ('PREPAYMENT')     THEN 'Vooruitbetaling'
            WHEN AIA.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE IN ('EXPENSE REPORT') THEN 'Onkosten Declaratie'
            ELSE 'Factuur'
       END AS "ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL"
    , AIA."CREATION_DATE" AS "EVENTTIME"
    , AIA."CREATED_BY" AS "USER_ID"
    , 'AI_'||AIA.INVOICE_ID AS "PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID"
FROM "AP_INVOICES_ALL" AIA
WHERE 1=1
    AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1
                    FROM "_EVENTLOG" EL
                    WHERE 1=1
                        AND EL."EVENT_ID" = 'EBS_AIA_'||AIA.INVOICE_ID||'_CREATE-INVOICE'
                    )
;

transformations.name: Insert Event: AI - Invoice Date
transformations.statement:
INSERT INTO "_EVENTLOG" (
    "EVENT_ID"
    ,"ACTIVITY_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_NL" 
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL" 
    ,"EVENTTIME"
    ,"USER_ID"
    ,"PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID"
)
SELECT 'EBS_AIA_'||AIA.INVOICE_ID||'_INVOICE-DATE' AS "EVENT_ID"
    , 'Invoice Date' AS "ACTIVITY_EN"
    , CASE WHEN AIA.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE IN ('CREDIT')         THEN 'Credit Memo'
           WHEN AIA.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE IN ('PREPAYMENT')     THEN 'Prepayment'
           WHEN AIA.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE IN ('EXPENSE REPORT') THEN 'Expense Report'
           ELSE 'Invoice'
       END ||' Date' AS "ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN"
    , 'Factuur Datum' AS "ACTIVITY_NL"
    , CASE WHEN AIA.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE IN ('CREDIT')         THEN 'Credit Factuur'
           WHEN AIA.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE IN ('PREPAYMENT')     THEN 'Vooruitbetaling'
           WHEN AIA.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE IN ('EXPENSE REPORT') THEN 'Onkosten Declaratie'
           ELSE 'Factuur'
       END ||' Datum' AS "ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL"
    , AIA."INVOICE_DATE" AS "EVENTTIME"
    , AIA."CREATED_BY" AS "USER_ID"
    , 'AI_'||AIA.INVOICE_ID AS "PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID"
FROM "AP_INVOICES_ALL" AIA
WHERE 1=1
    AND AIA."INVOICE_DATE" IS NOT NULL
    AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1
                    FROM "_EVENTLOG" EL
                    WHERE 1=1
                        AND EL."EVENT_ID" = 'EBS_AIA_'||AIA.INVOICE_ID||'_INVOICE-DATE'
                    )
;

transformations.name: Insert Event: AI - Invoice Workflow Approval Actions
transformations.statement:
INSERT INTO "_EVENTLOG" (
    "EVENT_ID"
    ,"ACTIVITY_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_NL" 
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL" 
    ,"EVENTTIME"
    ,"USER_ID"
    ,"PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID"
)
SELECT 'EBS_AIAHA_'||AIAHA.APPROVAL_HISTORY_ID||'_INVOICE-WF' AS "EVENT_ID"
  , CASE AIAHA.RESPONSE
      WHEN 'ACCEPT' THEN 'Accept Negotiation'
      WHEN 'ACKNOWLEDGE' THEN 'Acknowledge'
      WHEN 'APPROVED' THEN 'Approve'
      WHEN 'CANCEL' THEN 'Cancel Invoice'
      WHEN 'CANCELLED' THEN 'Cancel'
      WHEN 'DELEGATED' THEN 'Delegate'
      WHEN 'ESCALATED' THEN 'Escalate'
      WHEN 'INITIATED' THEN 'Initiate'
      WHEN 'MANUALLY APPROVED' THEN 'Approve Manually'
      WHEN 'NEEDS WFREAPPROVAL' THEN 'Needs Reapproval'
      WHEN 'NOT REQUIRED' THEN 'Not Required'
      WHEN 'REJECT' THEN 'Reject'
      WHEN 'REJECTED' THEN 'Reject'
      WHEN 'RELEASE' THEN 'Release Hold'
      WHEN 'REQUIRED' THEN 'Require'
      WHEN 'SENT' THEN 'Sent'
      WHEN 'STOPPED' THEN 'Stop'
      WHEN 'TRANSFERRED' THEN 'Transfer'
      WHEN 'WFAPPROVED' THEN 'Approve Workflow'
      WHEN 'WITHDRAWN' THEN 'Withdraw'
      ELSE AIAHA.RESPONSE
      END ||
      ' via Invoice Workflow'
      AS ACTIVITY_EN
  , CASE AIAHA.RESPONSE
      WHEN 'ACCEPT' THEN 'Accept Negotiation'
      WHEN 'ACKNOWLEDGE' THEN 'Acknowledge'
      WHEN 'APPROVED' THEN 'Approve'
      WHEN 'CANCEL' THEN 'Cancel Invoice'
      WHEN 'CANCELLED' THEN 'Cancel'
      WHEN 'DELEGATED' THEN 'Delegate'
      WHEN 'ESCALATED' THEN 'Escalate'
      WHEN 'INITIATED' THEN 'Initiate'
      WHEN 'MANUALLY APPROVED' THEN 'Approve Manually'
      WHEN 'NEEDS WFREAPPROVAL' THEN 'Needs Reapproval'
      WHEN 'NOT REQUIRED' THEN 'Not Required'
      WHEN 'REJECT' THEN 'Reject'
      WHEN 'REJECTED' THEN 'Reject'
      WHEN 'RELEASE' THEN 'Release Hold'
      WHEN 'REQUIRED' THEN 'Require'
      WHEN 'SENT' THEN 'Sent'
      WHEN 'STOPPED' THEN 'Stop'
      WHEN 'TRANSFERRED' THEN 'Transfer'
      WHEN 'WFAPPROVED' THEN 'Approve Workflow'
      WHEN 'WITHDRAWN' THEN 'Withdraw'
      ELSE AIAHA.RESPONSE
      END ||
      ' via Invoice Workflow'
      AS ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN
  , CASE AIAHA.RESPONSE
     WHEN 'ACCEPT' THEN 'Accepeteren Onderhandeling'
     WHEN 'ACKNOWLEDGE' THEN 'Bevestigen'
     WHEN 'APPROVED' THEN 'Goedkeuren' 
     WHEN 'CANCEL' THEN 'Annuleren Factuur'
     WHEN 'CANCELLED' THEN 'Annuleren'
     WHEN 'DELEGATED' THEN 'Overgedragen'
     WHEN 'ESCALATED' THEN 'Escaleren'
     WHEN 'INITIATED' THEN 'Starten'
     WHEN 'MANUALLY APPROVED' THEN 'Handmatig Goedkeuren'
     WHEN 'NEEDS WFREAPPROVAL' THEN 'Opnieuw Goedkeuring Vereist'
     WHEN 'NOT REQUIRED' THEN 'Niet Verplicht'
     WHEN 'REJECT' THEN 'Afwijzen'
     WHEN 'REJECTED' THEN 'Afwijzen'
     WHEN 'RELEASE' THEN 'Vrijgeven Blokkering'
     WHEN 'REQUIRED' THEN 'Verplicht'
     WHEN 'SENT' THEN 'Versturen'
     WHEN 'STOPPED' THEN 'Stoppen'
     WHEN 'TRANSFERRED' THEN 'Overboeken'
     WHEN 'WFAPPROVED' THEN 'Goedkeuren Workflow'
     WHEN 'WITHDRAWN' THEN 'Intrekken'
     ELSE AIAHA.RESPONSE
     END ||
     ' via Factuur Workflow'
     AS ACTIVITY_NL
  , CASE AIAHA.RESPONSE
     WHEN 'ACCEPT' THEN 'Accepeteren Onderhandeling'
     WHEN 'ACKNOWLEDGE' THEN 'Bevestigen'
     WHEN 'APPROVED' THEN 'Goedkeuren' 
     WHEN 'CANCEL' THEN 'Annuleren Factuur'
     WHEN 'CANCELLED' THEN 'Annuleren'
     WHEN 'DELEGATED' THEN 'Overgedragen'
     WHEN 'ESCALATED' THEN 'Escaleren'
     WHEN 'INITIATED' THEN 'Starten'
     WHEN 'MANUALLY APPROVED' THEN 'Handmatig Goedkeuren'
     WHEN 'NEEDS WFREAPPROVAL' THEN 'Opnieuw Goedkeuring Vereist'
     WHEN 'NOT REQUIRED' THEN 'Niet Verplicht'
     WHEN 'REJECT' THEN 'Afwijzen'
     WHEN 'REJECTED' THEN 'Afwijzen'
     WHEN 'RELEASE' THEN 'Vrijgeven Blokkering'
     WHEN 'REQUIRED' THEN 'Verplicht'
     WHEN 'SENT' THEN 'Versturen'
     WHEN 'STOPPED' THEN 'Stoppen'
     WHEN 'TRANSFERRED' THEN 'Overboeken'
     WHEN 'WFAPPROVED' THEN 'Goedkeuren Workflow'
     WHEN 'WITHDRAWN' THEN 'Intrekken'
     ELSE AIAHA.RESPONSE
     END ||
     ' via Factuur Workflow'
     AS ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL
  , AIAHA.CREATION_DATE AS EVENTTIME
  , AIAHA.CREATED_BY AS USER_ID
  , 'AI_'||AIAHA.INVOICE_ID AS "PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID"
FROM AP_INV_APRVL_HIST_ALL AIAHA
JOIN AP_INVOICES_ALL AIA ON 1=1
  AND AIAHA.INVOICE_ID = AIA.INVOICE_ID
WHERE 1=1
  AND AIAHA.HOLD_ID IS NULL -- exclude hold workflows
  AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1
                    FROM "_EVENTLOG" EL
                    WHERE 1=1
                        AND EL."EVENT_ID" = 'EBS_AIAHA_'||AIAHA.APPROVAL_HISTORY_ID||'_INVOICE-WF'
                    )
;

transformations.name: Insert Event: IP - Create or Void Payment
transformations.statement:
INSERT INTO "_EVENTLOG" (
    "EVENT_ID"
    ,"ACTIVITY_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_NL" 
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL" 
    ,"EVENTTIME"
    ,"USER_ID"
    ,"PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID"
)
SELECT 'EBS_AIPA_'||AIPA.INVOICE_PAYMENT_ID||'_INVOICE-PAYMENT' AS "EVENT_ID"
    , CASE WHEN AIPA.REVERSAL_INV_PMT_ID IS NOT NULL 
           THEN 'Void Payment' 
           ELSE 'Create Payment' 
      END AS "ACTIVITY_EN"
    , CASE WHEN AIPA.REVERSAL_INV_PMT_ID IS NOT NULL 
           THEN 'Void Payment' 
           ELSE 'Create Payment' 
      END AS "ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN"
    , CASE WHEN AIPA.REVERSAL_INV_PMT_ID IS NOT NULL 
           THEN 'Betaling Nietig Verklaren' 
           ELSE 'Aanmaken Betaling' 
      END AS "ACTIVITY_NL"
    , CASE WHEN AIPA.REVERSAL_INV_PMT_ID IS NOT NULL 
           THEN 'Betaling Nietig Verklaren' 
           ELSE 'Aanmaken Betaling' 
      END AS "ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL"
    , AIPA.CREATION_DATE AS "EVENTTIME"
    , AIPA.CREATED_BY AS "USER_ID"
    , 'IP_'||NVL(AIPA.REVERSAL_INV_PMT_ID, AIPA.INVOICE_PAYMENT_ID) AS "PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID" -- For reversals select the original inoivce payment id as primary object id
FROM AP_INVOICE_PAYMENTS_ALL AIPA
WHERE 1=1
    AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1
                    FROM "_EVENTLOG" EL
                    WHERE 1=1
                        AND EL."EVENT_ID" = 'EBS_AIPA_'||AIPA.INVOICE_PAYMENT_ID||'_INVOICE-PAYMENT'
                    )
;

transformations.name: Insert Event: GR - Record Goods Receipt
transformations.statement:
INSERT INTO "_EVENTLOG" (
    "EVENT_ID"
    ,"ACTIVITY_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_NL" 
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL" 
    ,"EVENTTIME"
    ,"USER_ID"
    ,"PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID"
)
SELECT 'EBS_RT_'||RT.TRANSACTION_ID||'_RECORD-GOODS_RECEIPT' AS "EVENT_ID"
, CASE RT.TRANSACTION_TYPE 
  WHEN 'RECEIVE' THEN 'Create Goods Receipt'
  WHEN 'DELIVER' THEN 'Deliver Goods Receipt'
  WHEN 'RETURN TO VENDOR' THEN 'Create Return to Vendor'
  WHEN 'CORRECT' THEN 'Create Goods Receipt Correction'
  WHEN 'TRANSFER' THEN 'Create Goods Receipt Transfer'
  WHEN 'ACCEPT' THEN 'Accept Goods Receipt'
  WHEN 'REJECT' THEN 'Reject Goods Receipt'
  ELSE RT.TRANSACTION_TYPE||' Goods Receipt'
  END AS ACTIVITY_EN
, CASE RT.TRANSACTION_TYPE 
  WHEN 'RECEIVE' THEN 'Create Goods Receipt'
  WHEN 'DELIVER' THEN 'Deliver Goods Receipt'
  WHEN 'RETURN TO VENDOR' THEN 'Create Return to Vendor'
  WHEN 'CORRECT' THEN 'Create Goods Receipt Correction'
  WHEN 'TRANSFER' THEN 'Create Goods Receipt Transfer'
  WHEN 'ACCEPT' THEN 'Accept Goods Receipt'
  WHEN 'REJECT' THEN 'Reject Goods Receipt'
  ELSE RT.TRANSACTION_TYPE||' Goods Receipt'
  END AS ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN
, CASE RT.TRANSACTION_TYPE 
  WHEN 'RECEIVE' THEN 'Aanmaken Goederenontvangst'
  WHEN 'DELIVER' THEN 'Afleveren Goederenontvangst'
  WHEN 'RETURN TO VENDOR' THEN 'Retourneren Goederenontvangst Naar Leverancier'
  WHEN 'CORRECT' THEN 'Corrigeren Goederenontvangst'
  WHEN 'TRANSFER' THEN 'Verplaatsen Goederenontvangst'
  WHEN 'ACCEPT' THEN 'Accepteren Goederenontvangst'
  WHEN 'REJECT' THEN 'Afwijzen Goederenontvangst'
  ELSE RT.TRANSACTION_TYPE||' Goederenontvangst'
  END AS ACTIVITY_NL
, CASE RT.TRANSACTION_TYPE 
  WHEN 'RECEIVE' THEN 'Aanmaken Goederenontvangst'
  WHEN 'DELIVER' THEN 'Afleveren Goederenontvangst'
  WHEN 'RETURN TO VENDOR' THEN 'Retourneren Goederenontvangst Naar Leverancier'
  WHEN 'CORRECT' THEN 'Corrigeren Goederenontvangst'
  WHEN 'TRANSFER' THEN 'Verplaatsen Goederenontvangst'
  WHEN 'ACCEPT' THEN 'Accepteren Goederenontvangst'
  WHEN 'REJECT' THEN 'Afwijzen Goederenontvangst'
  ELSE RT.TRANSACTION_TYPE||' Goederenontvangst'
  END AS ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL
, RT.CREATION_DATE AS EVENTTIME
, RT.CREATED_BY AS USER_ID
, 'GR_'||RSH.SHIPMENT_HEADER_ID AS "PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID" -- Shipment Header Id
FROM RCV_TRANSACTIONS RT
JOIN RCV_SHIPMENT_HEADERS RSH ON 1=1
	AND RT.SHIPMENT_HEADER_ID = RSH.SHIPMENT_HEADER_ID
WHERE 1=1
  AND RT.DESTINATION_TYPE_CODE = 'RECEIVING'
  AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1
                  FROM "_EVENTLOG" EL
                  WHERE 1=1
                    AND EL."EVENT_ID" = 'EBS_RT_'||RT.TRANSACTION_ID||'_RECORD-GOODS_RECEIPT'
                  )
;

transformations.name: Insert Event: BA - Deactivate Bank Account
transformations.statement:
INSERT INTO "_EVENTLOG" (
    "EVENT_ID"
    ,"ACTIVITY_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_NL" 
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL" 
    ,"EVENTTIME"
    ,"USER_ID"
    ,"PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID"
)
SELECT 'EBS_IEBA_'||IEBA.EXT_BANK_ACCOUNT_ID||'_DEACTIVATE-BANK-ACCOUNT' AS EVENT_ID
  , 'Deactivate Bank Account'                                 AS ACTIVITY_EN
  , 'Deactivate Bank Account'                                 AS ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN
  , 'Deactiveren Bankrekening'                                AS ACTIVITY_NL
  , 'Deactiveren Bankrekening'                                AS ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL
  , CASE WHEN TRUNC(IEBA.END_DATE) = IEBA.END_DATE
         THEN TIMESTAMPADD (SS, 86399, (IEBA.END_DATE)) 
         ELSE IEBA.END_DATE
    END                                                       AS EVENTTIME
  , NULL                                                      AS USER_ID  -- user who enddated the bankaccount can not be determined without audit trail
  , 'BA_'||IEBA.EXT_BANK_ACCOUNT_ID AS "PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID" 
FROM IBY_EXT_BANK_ACCOUNTS IEBA
WHERE 1=1
    AND IEBA.END_DATE IS NOT NULL
    AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1
                    FROM "_EVENTLOG" EL
                    WHERE 1=1
                        AND EL."EVENT_ID" = 'EBS_IEBA_'||IEBA.EXT_BANK_ACCOUNT_ID||'_DEACTIVATE-BANK-ACCOUNT'
                    )
;

transformations.name: Insert Event: BA - Assign Bank Account
transformations.statement:
INSERT INTO "_EVENTLOG" (
    "EVENT_ID"
    ,"ACTIVITY_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_NL" 
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL" 
    ,"EVENTTIME"
    ,"USER_ID"
    ,"PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID"
)
SELECT 'EBS_IPI_'||IPI.INSTRUMENT_PAYMENT_USE_ID||'_ASSIGN_BANK_ACCOUNT' AS EVENT_ID
, 'Assign Bank Account'                                     AS ACTIVITY_EN
, 'Assign Bank Account '||
    CASE WHEN IEPA.SUPPLIER_SITE_ID IS NULL 
          AND IEPA.PARTY_SITE_ID IS NULL
         THEN '(Supplier)'
         WHEN IEPA.SUPPLIER_SITE_ID IS NOT NULL 
         THEN '(Supplier Site)'
         WHEN IEPA.SUPPLIER_SITE_ID IS NULL
          AND IEPA.ORG_ID IS NOT NULL
         THEN '(Address and OU)'
         WHEN IEPA.PARTY_SITE_ID IS NOT NULL
          AND IEPA.SUPPLIER_SITE_ID IS NULL
          AND IEPA.ORG_ID IS NULL 
         THEN '(Address)'
         ELSE '()'
    END                                                     AS ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN
, 'Koppelen Bankrekening'                                   AS ACTIVITY_NL
, 'Koppelen Bankrekening '||
    CASE WHEN IEPA.SUPPLIER_SITE_ID IS NULL 
          AND IEPA.PARTY_SITE_ID IS NULL
         THEN '(Leverancier)'
         WHEN IEPA.SUPPLIER_SITE_ID IS NOT NULL 
         THEN '(Leverancier vestiging)'
         WHEN IEPA.SUPPLIER_SITE_ID IS NULL
          AND IEPA.ORG_ID IS NOT NULL
         THEN '(Adres en OU)'
         WHEN IEPA.PARTY_SITE_ID IS NOT NULL
          AND IEPA.SUPPLIER_SITE_ID IS NULL
          AND IEPA.ORG_ID IS NULL 
         THEN '(Adres)'
         ELSE '()'
    END                                                     AS ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL
  , IPI.CREATION_DATE                                                       AS EVENTTIME
  , IPI.CREATED_BY                                            AS USER_ID
  , 'BA_'||IEBA.EXT_BANK_ACCOUNT_ID AS "PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID" 
FROM IBY_EXT_BANK_ACCOUNTS IEBA
JOIN IBY_PMT_INSTR_USES_ALL IPI ON 1=1
    AND IPI.INSTRUMENT_ID = IEBA.EXT_BANK_ACCOUNT_ID
JOIN IBY_EXTERNAL_PAYEES_ALL IEPA ON 1=1
    AND IEPA.EXT_PAYEE_ID = IPI.EXT_PMT_PARTY_ID
WHERE 1=1
    AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1
                    FROM "_EVENTLOG" EL
                    WHERE 1=1
                        AND EL."EVENT_ID" = 'EBS_IPI_'||IPI.INSTRUMENT_PAYMENT_USE_ID||'_ASSIGN_BANK_ACCOUNT'
                    )
;

transformations.name: Insert Event: BA - Create Additional Account Owner
transformations.statement:
INSERT INTO "_EVENTLOG" (
    "EVENT_ID"
    ,"ACTIVITY_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_NL" 
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL" 
    ,"EVENTTIME"
    ,"USER_ID"
    ,"PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID"
)
SELECT 'EBS_IAO_'||IAO.ACCOUNT_OWNER_ID||'_CREATE_ADDITIONAL_ACCOUNT_OWNER' AS EVENT_ID
, 'Create Additional Account Owner'                         AS ACTIVITY_EN
, 'Create Additional Account Owner'                         AS ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN
, 'Verlenen Additionele Bankrekening Toegang'               AS ACTIVITY_NL
, 'Verlenen Additionele Bankrekening Toegang'               AS ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL
, IAO.CREATION_DATE                                         AS EVENTTIME
, IAO.CREATED_BY                                            AS USER_ID
  , 'BA_'||IAO.EXT_BANK_ACCOUNT_ID AS "PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID" 
FROM  (SELECT BAO.EXT_BANK_ACCOUNT_ID
              , BAO.ACCOUNT_OWNER_ID
              , BAO.CREATION_DATE
              , BAO.CREATED_BY
              , BAO.ACCOUNT_OWNER_PARTY_ID
         , RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY BAO.EXT_BANK_ACCOUNT_ID ORDER BY BAO.CREATION_DATE ASC) RNK
         FROM IBY_ACCOUNT_OWNERS BAO
        ) IAO
JOIN IBY_EXT_BANK_ACCOUNTS IEBA ON 1=1
  AND IAO.EXT_BANK_ACCOUNT_ID = IEBA.EXT_BANK_ACCOUNT_ID
WHERE 1=1
    AND IAO.RNK > 1  -- exclude the first account owner
    AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1
                    FROM "_EVENTLOG" EL
                    WHERE 1=1
                        AND EL."EVENT_ID" = 'EBS_IAO_'||IAO.ACCOUNT_OWNER_ID||'_CREATE_ADDITIONAL_ACCOUNT_OWNER'
                    )
;

transformations.name: Insert Event: BA - Change Name at Bank Account
transformations.statement:
INSERT INTO "_EVENTLOG" (
    "EVENT_ID"
    ,"ACTIVITY_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_NL" 
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL" 
    ,"EVENTTIME"
    ,"USER_ID"
    ,"PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID"
    ,"CHANGED_FROM"
    ,"CHANGED_TO"
)
SELECT 'EBS_IEBAA_'||BANK_ACCOUNT_CHANGE.EXT_BANK_ACCOUNT_ID||'-'||NVL(BANK_ACCOUNT_CHANGE.AUDIT_SESSION_ID,-1)||'-'||NVL(BANK_ACCOUNT_CHANGE.AUDIT_SEQUENCE_ID,-1)||'-'||BANK_ACCOUNT_CHANGE.AUDIT_TIMESTAMP||'_CHANGE_NAME_AT_BANK_ACCOUNT' AS EVENT_ID
, 'Change Name at Bank Account'                               AS ACTIVITY_EN
, 'Change Name at Bank Account'                               AS ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN
, 'Wijzigen Naam bij Bankrekening'                            AS ACTIVITY_NL
, 'Wijzigen Naam bij Bankrekening'                            AS ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL
, BANK_ACCOUNT_CHANGE.AUDIT_TIMESTAMP                         AS EVENTTIME
, FU.USER_ID                                                  AS USER_ID
, 'BA_'||BANK_ACCOUNT_CHANGE.EXT_BANK_ACCOUNT_ID AS "PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID" 
, BANK_ACCOUNT_CHANGE.PREV_BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME                  AS CHANGED_FROM
, BANK_ACCOUNT_CHANGE.BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME                       AS CHANGED_TO
FROM (  SELECT BANK_ACCOUNTS.EXT_BANK_ACCOUNT_ID
        , BANK_ACCOUNTS.AUDIT_TIMESTAMP
        , BANK_ACCOUNTS.AUDIT_USER_NAME
        , BANK_ACCOUNTS.AUDIT_TRANSACTION_TYPE
        , BANK_ACCOUNTS.AUDIT_SESSION_ID 
        , BANK_ACCOUNTS.AUDIT_SEQUENCE_ID
        , BANK_ACCOUNTS.PREV_BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME
        , NVL(BANK_ACCOUNTS.BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME, LAST_VALUE(BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME IGNORE NULLS) OVER (PARTITION BY BANK_ACCOUNTS.EXT_BANK_ACCOUNT_ID ORDER BY BANK_ACCOUNTS.AUDIT_TIMESTAMP DESC, BANK_ACCOUNTS.AUDIT_SEQUENCE_ID)) AS BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME
        FROM ( SELECT IEBAA.EXT_BANK_ACCOUNT_ID
                , IEBAA.AUDIT_TIMESTAMP
                , IEBAA.AUDIT_USER_NAME
                , IEBAA.AUDIT_TRANSACTION_TYPE
                , IEBAA.AUDIT_SESSION_ID 
                , IEBAA.AUDIT_SEQUENCE_ID
                , IEBAA.BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME AS PREV_BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME
                , LAG(IEBAA.BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME,1,NULL) OVER (PARTITION BY IEBAA.EXT_BANK_ACCOUNT_ID ORDER BY IEBAA.AUDIT_TIMESTAMP DESC, IEBAA.AUDIT_SEQUENCE_ID DESC) BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME
                FROM IBY_EXT_BANK_ACCOUNTS_A IEBAA
                WHERE 1=1
                    AND IEBAA.AUDIT_TRANSACTION_TYPE NOT IN ('L')
                UNION ALL
                SELECT IEBA.EXT_BANK_ACCOUNT_ID
                , SYSDATE
                , NVL(FU.USER_NAME,TO_CHAR(IEBA.LAST_UPDATED_BY))
                , 'C'
                , 999999999
                , 999999999
                , NULL
                , IEBA.BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME
                FROM IBY_EXT_BANK_ACCOUNTS IEBA
                LEFT JOIN FND_USER FU ON 1=1
                    AND IEBA.LAST_UPDATED_BY = FU.USER_ID
                WHERE 1=1 ) BANK_ACCOUNTS
        WHERE 1=1
        ) BANK_ACCOUNT_CHANGE
JOIN IBY_EXT_BANK_ACCOUNTS IEBA ON 1=1
    AND BANK_ACCOUNT_CHANGE.EXT_BANK_ACCOUNT_ID = IEBA.EXT_BANK_ACCOUNT_ID
LEFT JOIN FND_USER FU ON 1=1
    AND BANK_ACCOUNT_CHANGE.AUDIT_USER_NAME = FU.USER_NAME
WHERE 1=1
    AND BANK_ACCOUNT_CHANGE.PREV_BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME <> BANK_ACCOUNT_CHANGE.BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME
    AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1
                    FROM "_EVENTLOG" EL
                    WHERE 1=1
                        AND EL."EVENT_ID" = 'EBS_IEBAA_'||BANK_ACCOUNT_CHANGE.EXT_BANK_ACCOUNT_ID||'-'||NVL(BANK_ACCOUNT_CHANGE.AUDIT_SESSION_ID,-1)||'-'||NVL(BANK_ACCOUNT_CHANGE.AUDIT_SEQUENCE_ID,-1)||'-'||BANK_ACCOUNT_CHANGE.AUDIT_TIMESTAMP||'_CHANGE_NAME_AT_BANK_ACCOUNT'
                    )
;

transformations.name: Insert Event: CA - Create Purchase Agreement
transformations.statement:
INSERT INTO "_EVENTLOG" (
    "EVENT_ID"
    ,"ACTIVITY_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_NL" 
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL" 
    ,"EVENTTIME"
    ,"USER_ID"
    ,"PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID"
)
SELECT 'EBS_PHA_'||PHA."PO_HEADER_ID"||'_CREATE-CONTRACT' AS "EVENT_ID"
    , 'Create Purchase Agreement' AS "ACTIVITY_EN"
    , CASE WHEN PHA."TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE" = 'BLANKET' THEN 'Create Blanket Purchase Agreement'
           WHEN PHA."TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE" = 'CONTRACT' THEN 'Create Contract Purchase Agreement'
      END  AS "ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN"
    , 'Aanmaken Inkoopovereenkomst' AS "ACTIVITY_NL"
    , CASE WHEN PHA."TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE" = 'BLANKET' THEN 'Aanmaken Raamovereenkomst'
           WHEN PHA."TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE" = 'CONTRACT' THEN 'Aanmaken Inkoopovereenkomst'
      END  AS "ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL"
    , PHA."CREATION_DATE" AS "EVENTTIME"
    , PHA."CREATED_BY" AS "USER_ID"
    , 'CA_'||PHA."PO_HEADER_ID" AS "PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID"
FROM "PO_HEADERS_ALL" PHA
WHERE 1=1
    AND PHA."TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE" IN ('BLANKET','CONTRACT')
    AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1
                    FROM "_EVENTLOG" EL
                    WHERE 1=1
                        AND EL."EVENT_ID" = 'EBS_PHA_'||PHA."PO_HEADER_ID"||'_CREATE-CONTRACT'
                    )
;

transformations.name: Insert Event: CA - Purchase Agreement Actions
transformations.statement:
INSERT INTO "_EVENTLOG" (
    "EVENT_ID"
    ,"ACTIVITY_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN"
    ,"ACTIVITY_NL" 
    ,"ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL" 
    ,"EVENTTIME"
    ,"USER_ID"
    ,"PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID"
    --
    ,"NOTE"
)
SELECT DISTINCT 'EBS_PAH_'||COALESCE(PAH.OBJECT_ID,0)||'-'||COALESCE(PAH.SEQUENCE_NUM,0)||'-'||COALESCE(PAH.OBJECT_TYPE_CODE,'')||'-'||COALESCE(PAH.OBJECT_SUB_TYPE_CODE,'')||'_ACTION-PA' AS "EVENT_ID"
, CASE PAH.ACTION_CODE
       WHEN 'ACCEPT' THEN 'Accept'
       WHEN 'APPROVE' THEN 'Approve'
       WHEN 'CANCEL' THEN 'Cancel'
       WHEN 'CLOSE' THEN 'Close'
       WHEN 'FINALLY CLOSE' THEN 'Finally Close'
       WHEN 'FORWARD' THEN 'Forward'
       WHEN 'DELEGATE' THEN 'Delegate'
       WHEN 'HOLD' THEN 'Hold'
       WHEN 'NO ACTION' THEN 'No Action'
       WHEN 'OPEN' THEN 'Open'
       WHEN 'REJECT' THEN 'Reject'
       WHEN 'RELEASE HOLD' THEN 'Release Hold'
       WHEN 'RESERVE' THEN 'Reserve'
       WHEN 'SIGNED' THEN 'Sign'
       WHEN 'SUBMIT' THEN 'Submit'
       WHEN 'SUBMIT CHANGE' THEN 'Submit Change'
       WHEN 'RESPOND' THEN 'Respond'
       WHEN 'UNRESERVE' THEN 'Unreserve'
       WHEN 'ANSWER' THEN 'Provide Information about'
       WHEN 'APPROVE AND FORWARD' THEN 'Approve and Forward'
       WHEN 'BUYER REJECTED' THEN 'Buyer Rejects'
       WHEN 'FREEZE' THEN 'Freeze'
       WHEN 'QUESTION' THEN 'Request Information about'
       WHEN 'UNFREEZE' THEN 'Unfreeze'
       ELSE NVL(PAH.ACTION_CODE,'Waiting for Action')
       END
       ||' Purchase Agreement'
       AS ACTIVITY_EN
, CASE PAH.ACTION_CODE
       WHEN 'ACCEPT' THEN 'Accept'
       WHEN 'APPROVE' THEN 'Approve'
       WHEN 'CANCEL' THEN 'Cancel'
       WHEN 'CLOSE' THEN 'Close'
       WHEN 'FINALLY CLOSE' THEN 'Finally Close'
       WHEN 'FORWARD' THEN 'Forward'
       WHEN 'DELEGATE' THEN 'Delegate'
       WHEN 'HOLD' THEN 'Hold'
       WHEN 'NO ACTION' THEN 'No Action'
       WHEN 'OPEN' THEN 'Open'
       WHEN 'REJECT' THEN 'Reject'
       WHEN 'RELEASE HOLD' THEN 'Release Hold'
       WHEN 'RESERVE' THEN 'Reserve'
       WHEN 'SIGNED' THEN 'Sign'
       WHEN 'SUBMIT' THEN 'Submit'
       WHEN 'SUBMIT CHANGE' THEN 'Submit Change'
       WHEN 'RESPOND' THEN 'Respond'
       WHEN 'UNRESERVE' THEN 'Unreserve'
       WHEN 'ANSWER' THEN 'Provide Information about'
       WHEN 'APPROVE AND FORWARD' THEN 'Approve and Forward'
       WHEN 'BUYER REJECTED' THEN 'Buyer Rejects'
       WHEN 'FREEZE' THEN 'Freeze'
       WHEN 'QUESTION' THEN 'Request Information about'
       WHEN 'UNFREEZE' THEN 'Unfreeze'
       ELSE NVL(PAH.ACTION_CODE,'Waiting for Action')
       END
       ||' Purchase Agreement'
       AS ACTIVITY_DETAIL_EN
, CASE PAH.ACTION_CODE
       WHEN 'ACCEPT' THEN 'Accepteren'
       WHEN 'APPROVE' THEN 'Goedkeuren'
       WHEN 'CANCEL' THEN 'Annuleren'
       WHEN 'CLOSE' THEN 'Afsluiten'
       WHEN 'FINALLY CLOSE' THEN 'Definitief Afsluiten'
       WHEN 'FORWARD' THEN 'Doorsturen'
       WHEN 'DELEGATE' THEN 'Delegeren'
       WHEN 'HOLD' THEN 'Blokkeren'
       WHEN 'NO ACTION' THEN 'Geen Actie'
       WHEN 'OPEN' THEN 'Openen'
       WHEN 'REJECT' THEN 'Afwijzen'
       WHEN 'RELEASE HOLD' THEN 'Vrijgeven Blokkade'
       WHEN 'RESERVE' THEN 'Reserveren'
       WHEN 'SIGNED' THEN 'Tekenen'
       WHEN 'SUBMIT' THEN 'Versturen'
       WHEN 'SUBMIT CHANGE' THEN 'Versturen Wijziging'
       WHEN 'RESPOND' THEN 'Beantwoorden'
       WHEN 'UNRESERVE' THEN 'Reservering Annuleren'
       WHEN 'ANSWER' THEN 'Vraag Beantwoorden over'
       WHEN 'APPROVE AND FORWARD' THEN 'Goedkeuren en Doorsturen'
       WHEN 'BUYER REJECTED' THEN 'Afwijzen door Inkoper van'
       WHEN 'FREEZE' THEN 'Bevriezen'
       WHEN 'QUESTION' THEN 'Vraag Stellen over'
       WHEN 'UNFREEZE' THEN 'Opheffen Bevriezing'
       ELSE NVL(PAH.ACTION_CODE,'Wacht op Actie')
       END 
       ||' Inkoopovereenkomst' AS ACTIVITY_NL
, CASE PAH.ACTION_CODE
       WHEN 'ACCEPT' THEN 'Accepteren'
       WHEN 'APPROVE' THEN 'Goedkeuren'
       WHEN 'CANCEL' THEN 'Annuleren'
       WHEN 'CLOSE' THEN 'Afsluiten'
       WHEN 'FINALLY CLOSE' THEN 'Definitief Afsluiten'
       WHEN 'FORWARD' THEN 'Doorsturen'
       WHEN 'DELEGATE' THEN 'Delegeren'
       WHEN 'HOLD' THEN 'Blokkeren'
       WHEN 'NO ACTION' THEN 'Geen Actie'
       WHEN 'OPEN' THEN 'Openen'
       WHEN 'REJECT' THEN 'Afwijzen'
       WHEN 'RELEASE HOLD' THEN 'Vrijgeven Blokkade'
       WHEN 'RESERVE' THEN 'Reserveren'
       WHEN 'SIGNED' THEN 'Tekenen'
       WHEN 'SUBMIT' THEN 'Versturen'
       WHEN 'SUBMIT CHANGE' THEN 'Versturen Wijziging'
       WHEN 'RESPOND' THEN 'Beantwoorden'
       WHEN 'UNRESERVE' THEN 'Reservering Annuleren'
       WHEN 'ANSWER' THEN 'Vraag Beantwoorden over'
       WHEN 'APPROVE AND FORWARD' THEN 'Goedkeuren en Doorsturen'
       WHEN 'BUYER REJECTED' THEN 'Afwijzen door Inkoper van'
       WHEN 'FREEZE' THEN 'Bevriezen'
       WHEN 'QUESTION' THEN 'Vraag Stellen over'
       WHEN 'UNFREEZE' THEN 'Opheffen Bevriezing'
       ELSE NVL(PAH.ACTION_CODE,'Wacht op Actie')
       END 
       ||' Inkoopovereenkomst' AS ACTIVITY_DETAIL_NL
    , PAH.ACTION_DATE AS EVENTTIME
    , CASE WHEN PAH.EMPLOYEE_ID IS NULL 
           THEN PAH.CREATED_BY
           ELSE NVL(X."USER_ID",-1)
      END AS "USER_ID"
    , 'PO_'||PAH."OBJECT_ID" AS "PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID"  -- Purchase Order Header Id
    --
    , PAH.NOTE
FROM "PO_ACTION_HISTORY" PAH
JOIN "PO_HEADERS_ALL" PHA ON 1=1
	AND PHA."PO_HEADER_ID" = PAH."OBJECT_ID"
	AND PAH."OBJECT_TYPE_CODE" = 'PA' -- Purchase Agreement 
	AND PAH."OBJECT_SUB_TYPE_CODE" IN ('BLANKET','CONTRACT')
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT EMPLOYEE_ID
            , FIRST_VALUE ("USER_ID") OVER(PARTITION BY "EMPLOYEE_ID" ORDER BY "USER_ID" DESC) AS "USER_ID"
            , FIRST_VALUE ("USER_NAME") OVER(PARTITION BY "EMPLOYEE_ID" ORDER BY "USER_ID" DESC) AS "USER_NAME"
            FROM FND_USER
            WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID IS NOT NULL
          ) X ON 1=1
    AND PAH.EMPLOYEE_ID = X.EMPLOYEE_ID
WHERE 1=1
	AND PAH."ACTION_DATE" IS NOT NULL
	AND PAH."ACTION_CODE" IS NOT NULL 
	AND PAH."ACTION_CODE" NOT IN ('NO ACTION','RESERVE', 'UNRESERVE') 
    AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1
                    FROM "_EVENTLOG" EL
                    WHERE 1=1
                        AND EL."EVENT_ID" = 'EBS_PAH_'||COALESCE(PAH.OBJECT_ID,0)||'-'||COALESCE(PAH.SEQUENCE_NUM,0)||'-'||COALESCE(PAH.OBJECT_TYPE_CODE,'')||'-'||COALESCE(PAH.OBJECT_SUB_TYPE_CODE,'')||'_ACTION-PA'
                    )
;

transformations.name: Insert Link Event Id - Object Id for All Primary Object Ids
transformations.statement:
INSERT INTO "_LINK_EVENT_ID_OBJECT_ID" (
     "EVENT_ID"
    ,"OBJECT_ID"
    ,"_CREATION_DATE"
)
SELECT "EVENT_ID"
    , "PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID"
    , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
FROM "_EVENTLOG" EL
WHERE 1=1
   AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1
                    FROM "_LINK_EVENT_ID_OBJECT_ID" LEO
                    WHERE 1=1
                    AND EL."EVENT_ID" = LEO."EVENT_ID"
                    AND EL."PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID" = LEO."OBJECT_ID"
                  ) 
;

transformations.name: Create Table: _PO_PO_HEADERS_ALL
transformations.statement:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS "_PO_PO_HEADERS_ALL";
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS XX_RATE;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS XX_LAST_RATE;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS XX_PO_DIS_ORDERED_AMOUNT;

-- temp table to avoid memory errors
CREATE TABLE XX_RATE AS
SELECT CONVERSION_TYPE 
 , FROM_CURRENCY 
 , TO_CURRENCY 
 , CONVERSION_DATE
 , CONVERSION_RATE
 FROM GL_DAILY_RATES 
 WHERE 1=1
 AND CONVERSION_TYPE = '<%=CURRENCY_CONVERSION_TYPE%>'
 AND TO_CURRENCY = '<%=REPORTING_CURRENCY%>'
;

-- temp table to avoid memory errors
CREATE TABLE XX_LAST_RATE AS
SELECT CONVERSION_TYPE 
  , FROM_CURRENCY 
  , TO_CURRENCY 
  , CONVERSION_DATE 
  , CONVERSION_RATE 
  , RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY FROM_CURRENCY, TO_CURRENCY ORDER BY CONVERSION_DATE,CONVERSION_TYPE DESC) RNK
  FROM GL_DAILY_RATES
  WHERE CONVERSION_DATE < SYSDATE
  AND TO_CURRENCY = '<%=REPORTING_CURRENCY%>'
;

-- temp table for PO Dis Ordered Amount
CREATE TABLE XX_PO_DIS_ORDERED_AMOUNT AS
SELECT PD.PO_HEADER_ID
, PD.PO_DISTRIBUTION_ID
, CASE 
 		WHEN PL.ORDER_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE IN ('RATE', 'FIXED PRICE')
        THEN 
        	CASE 
            	WHEN PH.CURRENCY_CODE = '<%=REPORTING_CURRENCY%>'
                THEN ROUND(PD.AMOUNT_ORDERED, 2)
                WHEN PD.RATE IS NOT NULL AND GL.CURRENCY_CODE = '<%=REPORTING_CURRENCY%>'
                THEN ROUND(PD.AMOUNT_ORDERED * PD.RATE, 2)  -- MK 20210823 JIRA PROMI-9
                WHEN RATE.CONVERSION_RATE IS NOT NULL 
                THEN ROUND(PD.AMOUNT_ORDERED * RATE.CONVERSION_RATE, 2)
                WHEN LAST_RATE.CONVERSION_RATE IS NOT NULL 
                THEN ROUND(PD.AMOUNT_ORDERED * LAST_RATE.CONVERSION_RATE, 2)
                ELSE 0
           	END
  		ELSE 
        	CASE 
            	WHEN PH.CURRENCY_CODE = '<%=REPORTING_CURRENCY%>'
            	THEN ROUND(PD.QUANTITY_ORDERED * PLL.PRICE_OVERRIDE, 2)
                WHEN PD.RATE IS NOT NULL AND GL.CURRENCY_CODE = '<%=REPORTING_CURRENCY%>'
                THEN ROUND(PD.QUANTITY_ORDERED * PLL.PRICE_OVERRIDE * PD.RATE, 2)  -- MK 20210823 JIRA PROMI-9
                WHEN RATE.CONVERSION_RATE IS NOT NULL 
                THEN ROUND(PD.QUANTITY_ORDERED * PLL.PRICE_OVERRIDE * RATE.CONVERSION_RATE, 2)
                WHEN LAST_RATE.CONVERSION_RATE IS NOT NULL
                THEN ROUND(PD.QUANTITY_ORDERED * PLL.PRICE_OVERRIDE * LAST_RATE.CONVERSION_RATE, 2)
            	ELSE 0
             END
 	   END AS REPORTING_AMOUNT_ORDERED
FROM PO_DISTRIBUTIONS_ALL PD 
JOIN PO_LINE_LOCATIONS_ALL PLL ON 1=1
	AND PLL.LINE_LOCATION_ID = PD.LINE_LOCATION_ID
JOIN PO_LINES_ALL PL ON 1=1
	AND PL.PO_LINE_ID = PD.PO_LINE_ID
JOIN PO_HEADERS_ALL PH ON 1=1
	AND PH.PO_HEADER_ID = PD.PO_HEADER_ID
JOIN GL_LEDGERS GL ON 1=1
	AND GL.LEDGER_ID = PD.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID
LEFT JOIN XX_RATE RATE ON 1=1
	AND RATE.FROM_CURRENCY = PH.CURRENCY_CODE
	AND TRUNC(RATE.CONVERSION_DATE) = TRUNC(NVL(PD.RATE_DATE,PD.CREATION_DATE))
LEFT JOIN XX_LAST_RATE LAST_RATE ON 1=1
  AND LAST_RATE.FROM_CURRENCY = PH.CURRENCY_CODE
  AND LAST_RATE.RNK = 1    
; 


CREATE TABLE "_PO_PO_HEADERS_ALL" AS (
	SELECT 'PO_'||CAST(PHA.PO_HEADER_ID AS VARCHAR(100)) AS "OBJECT_ID"
    , PHA.TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE AS TYPE
    , SUM(X.REPORTING_AMOUNT_ORDERED) AS AMOUNT
    , PHA.SEGMENT1 AS NUMBER
    , PHA.COMMENTS AS DESCRIPTION
    , PHA.ORG_ID AS ORGANIZATION
    , PAPF.FULL_NAME AS BUYER
  	FROM "PO_HEADERS_ALL" PHA
    LEFT JOIN PER_ALL_PEOPLE_F PAPF ON 1=1
        AND PAPF.PERSON_ID = PHA.AGENT_ID
        AND TRUNC(PHA.LAST_UPDATE_DATE) BETWEEN PAPF.EFFECTIVE_START_DATE AND PAPF.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE
    LEFT JOIN XX_PO_DIS_ORDERED_AMOUNT X ON 1=1
        AND PHA.PO_HEADER_ID = X.PO_HEADER_ID
    WHERE 1=1
      --AND PHA."TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE" = 'STANDARD' -- Vooropig ook even alle andere types toegevoegd.
    GROUP BY PHA.PO_HEADER_ID
    , PHA.TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE
    , PHA.SEGMENT1
    , PHA.COMMENTS
    , PHA.ORG_ID
    , PAPF.FULL_NAME
)
;


-- DROP TABLE IF EXISTS XX_RATE;
-- DROP TABLE IF EXISTS XX_LAST_RATE;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS XX_PO_DIS_ORDERED_AMOUNT;

transformations.name: Create Table: _PL_PO_LINES_ALL
transformations.statement:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS "_PL_PO_LINES_ALL";
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS XX_PO_DIS_ORDERED_AMOUNT_LINE;

-- temp table for PO Dis Ordered Amount per Line
CREATE TABLE XX_PO_DIS_ORDERED_AMOUNT_LINE AS
SELECT PD.PO_LINE_ID
, PD.PO_DISTRIBUTION_ID
, CASE 
 		WHEN PL.ORDER_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE IN ('RATE', 'FIXED PRICE')
        THEN 
        	CASE 
            	WHEN PH.CURRENCY_CODE = '<%=REPORTING_CURRENCY%>'
                THEN ROUND(PD.AMOUNT_ORDERED, 2)
                WHEN PD.RATE IS NOT NULL AND GL.CURRENCY_CODE = '<%=REPORTING_CURRENCY%>'
                THEN ROUND(PD.AMOUNT_ORDERED * PD.RATE, 2)  -- MK 20210823 JIRA PROMI-9
                WHEN RATE.CONVERSION_RATE IS NOT NULL 
                THEN ROUND(PD.AMOUNT_ORDERED * RATE.CONVERSION_RATE, 2)
                WHEN LAST_RATE.CONVERSION_RATE IS NOT NULL 
                THEN ROUND(PD.AMOUNT_ORDERED * LAST_RATE.CONVERSION_RATE, 2)
                ELSE 0
           	END
  		ELSE 
        	CASE 
            	WHEN PH.CURRENCY_CODE = '<%=REPORTING_CURRENCY%>'
            	THEN ROUND(PD.QUANTITY_ORDERED * PLL.PRICE_OVERRIDE, 2)
                WHEN PD.RATE IS NOT NULL AND GL.CURRENCY_CODE = '<%=REPORTING_CURRENCY%>'
                THEN ROUND(PD.QUANTITY_ORDERED * PLL.PRICE_OVERRIDE * PD.RATE, 2)  -- MK 20210823 JIRA PROMI-9
                WHEN RATE.CONVERSION_RATE IS NOT NULL 
                THEN ROUND(PD.QUANTITY_ORDERED * PLL.PRICE_OVERRIDE * RATE.CONVERSION_RATE, 2)
                WHEN LAST_RATE.CONVERSION_RATE IS NOT NULL
                THEN ROUND(PD.QUANTITY_ORDERED * PLL.PRICE_OVERRIDE * LAST_RATE.CONVERSION_RATE, 2)
            	ELSE 0
             END
 	   END AS REPORTING_AMOUNT_ORDERED
FROM PO_DISTRIBUTIONS_ALL PD 
JOIN PO_LINE_LOCATIONS_ALL PLL ON 1=1
	AND PLL.LINE_LOCATION_ID = PD.LINE_LOCATION_ID
JOIN PO_LINES_ALL PL ON 1=1
	AND PL.PO_LINE_ID = PD.PO_LINE_ID
JOIN PO_HEADERS_ALL PH ON 1=1
	AND PH.PO_HEADER_ID = PD.PO_HEADER_ID
JOIN GL_LEDGERS GL ON 1=1
	AND GL.LEDGER_ID = PD.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID
LEFT JOIN XX_RATE RATE ON 1=1
	AND RATE.FROM_CURRENCY = PH.CURRENCY_CODE
	AND TRUNC(RATE.CONVERSION_DATE) = TRUNC(NVL(PD.RATE_DATE,PD.CREATION_DATE))
LEFT JOIN XX_LAST_RATE LAST_RATE ON 1=1
  AND LAST_RATE.FROM_CURRENCY = PH.CURRENCY_CODE
  AND LAST_RATE.RNK = 1    
; 


CREATE TABLE "_PL_PO_LINES_ALL" AS (
	SELECT 'PL_'||CAST(PLA.PO_LINE_ID AS VARCHAR(100)) AS "OBJECT_ID"
    , PLTT.LINE_TYPE AS TYPE
    , SUM(X.REPORTING_AMOUNT_ORDERED) AS AMOUNT
    , PLA.ITEM_DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION
    , PLA.ORG_ID AS ORGANIZATION
    , MCB.SEGMENT1 AS CATEGORY
    , PLA.QUANTITY
    , PLA.UNIT_MEAS_LOOKUP_CODE AS UNIT_OF_MEASURE
    , PLA.UNIT_PRICE AS PRICE
    -- AS REQUESTOR
  	FROM "PO_LINES_ALL" PLA
    JOIN PO_HEADERS_ALL PHA ON 1=1
      AND PLA.PO_HEADER_ID = PHA.PO_HEADER_ID
    LEFT JOIN "PO_LINE_TYPES_TL" PLTT ON 1=1
      AND PLA.LINE_TYPE_ID = PLTT.LINE_TYPE_ID
      AND PLTT.LANGUAGE = '<%=LANGUAGE%>'
    LEFT JOIN MTL_CATEGORIES_B MCB ON 1=1
      AND PLA.CATEGORY_ID = MCB.CATEGORY_ID
    LEFT JOIN XX_PO_DIS_ORDERED_AMOUNT_LINE X ON 1=1
      AND PLA.PO_LINE_ID = X.PO_LINE_ID
    WHERE 1=1
      AND PHA.TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE = 'STANDARD'
    GROUP BY PLA.PO_LINE_ID
    , PLTT.LINE_TYPE
    , PLA.ITEM_DESCRIPTION
    , PLA.ORG_ID
    , MCB.SEGMENT1
    , PLA.QUANTITY
    , PLA.UNIT_MEAS_LOOKUP_CODE
    , PLA.UNIT_PRICE
)
;


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS XX_PO_DIS_ORDERED_AMOUNT_LINE;

transformations.name: Create Table: _GR_RCV_SHIPMENT_HEADERS
Create Table: _AI_AP_INVOICES_ALL
transformations.statement:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS AP_TEMP_XAIPA;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _AI_AP_INVOICES_ALL;

CREATE TABLE AP_TEMP_XAIPA AS
(
 WITH AIPA_TEMP AS ( 
   SELECT PAY_AIPA.INVOICE_ID
  , SUM(PAY_AIPA.DISCOUNT_TAKEN) AS DISCOUNT_TAKEN
  , SUM(PAY_AIPA.DISCOUNT_LOST) AS DISCOUNT_LOST
  , SUM(CASE  -- convert currency if necessary to reporting currency for taken discount
       WHEN PAY_AI.INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE = '<%=REPORTING_CURRENCY%>' 
       THEN ROUND(PAY_AIPA.DISCOUNT_TAKEN,2)
       WHEN PAY_RATE.CONVERSION_RATE IS NOT NULL
       THEN ROUND(PAY_RATE.CONVERSION_RATE * PAY_AIPA.DISCOUNT_TAKEN,2)
       WHEN PAY_LAST_RATE.CONVERSION_RATE IS NOT NULL 
       THEN ROUND( PAY_LAST_RATE.CONVERSION_RATE * PAY_AIPA.DISCOUNT_TAKEN,2)
       ELSE 0
       END) AS REPORTING_DISCOUNT_TAKEN
  , SUM(CASE  -- convert currency if necessary to reporting currency for lost discount
       WHEN PAY_AI.INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE = '<%=REPORTING_CURRENCY%>' 
       THEN ROUND(PAY_AIPA.DISCOUNT_LOST,2)
       WHEN PAY_RATE.CONVERSION_RATE IS NOT NULL 
       THEN ROUND(PAY_RATE.CONVERSION_RATE * PAY_AIPA.DISCOUNT_LOST,2) 
       WHEN PAY_LAST_RATE.CONVERSION_RATE IS NOT NULL 
       THEN ROUND(PAY_LAST_RATE.CONVERSION_RATE * PAY_AIPA.DISCOUNT_LOST,2)
       ELSE 0
       END) AS REPORTING_DISCOUNT_LOST
  , MAX(PAY_AIPA.ACCOUNTING_DATE) AS ACCOUNTING_DATE
 FROM AP_INVOICE_PAYMENTS_ALL PAY_AIPA
 JOIN AP_INVOICES_ALL PAY_AI ON 1=1
 	AND PAY_AIPA.INVOICE_ID = PAY_AI.INVOICE_ID
 JOIN GL_LEDGERS PAY_GL ON 1=1
 	AND PAY_AI.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID = PAY_GL.LEDGER_ID
 LEFT JOIN (SELECT CONVERSION_TYPE 
            , FROM_CURRENCY
            , TO_CURRENCY
            , CONVERSION_DATE
            , CONVERSION_RATE
            FROM GL_DAILY_RATES 
            WHERE 1=1
            	AND CONVERSION_TYPE = '<%=CURRENCY_CONVERSION_TYPE%>'
           	 	AND TO_CURRENCY = '<%=REPORTING_CURRENCY%>'
           ) PAY_RATE ON 1=1
 	 AND PAY_RATE.FROM_CURRENCY = PAY_AI.INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE
 	 AND TRUNC(PAY_RATE.CONVERSION_DATE) = TRUNC(NVL(PAY_AIPA.EXCHANGE_DATE, PAY_AIPA.CREATION_DATE))
 LEFT JOIN (SELECT CONVERSION_TYPE
            	, FROM_CURRENCY
           	 	, TO_CURRENCY
            	, CONVERSION_DATE
            	, CONVERSION_RATE 
            	, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY FROM_CURRENCY, TO_CURRENCY ORDER BY CONVERSION_DATE, CONVERSION_TYPE DESC) RNK
            	FROM GL_DAILY_RATES
            	WHERE CONVERSION_DATE < SYSDATE
            		AND TO_CURRENCY = '<%=REPORTING_CURRENCY%>'
                ) PAY_LAST_RATE ON 1=1
 			AND PAY_LAST_RATE.FROM_CURRENCY = PAY_AI.INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE
   			AND PAY_LAST_RATE.RNK = '1'
 WHERE 1=1
     AND COALESCE(PAY_AIPA.REVERSAL_FLAG,'N') = 'N'
 GROUP BY PAY_AIPA.INVOICE_ID
)
  SELECT AIPA.INVOICE_ID, 
  	DISCOUNT_TAKEN,
  	DISCOUNT_LOST,
  	REPORTING_DISCOUNT_TAKEN, 
  	REPORTING_DISCOUNT_LOST, 
  	AIPA.ACCOUNTING_DATE, 
  	AC.CLEARED_DATE
  FROM AIPA_TEMP AIPA
  LEFT JOIN (SELECT PAY_AIPA.INVOICE_ID, MAX(AC.CLEARED_DATE) as CLEARED_DATE
 			 FROM AP_INVOICE_PAYMENTS_ALL PAY_AIPA
 			 JOIN AP_CHECKS_ALL AC ON 1=1
 				AND AC.CHECK_ID = PAY_AIPA.CHECK_ID
  			 GROUP BY invoice_id) AS AC ON 1=1
        AND AC.INVOICE_ID = AIPA.INVOICE_ID
  WHERE 1=1
);

CREATE TABLE "_AI_AP_INVOICES_ALL" AS(
SELECT DISTINCT
    'AI_'||CAST(AI.INVOICE_ID AS  VARCHAR(100))   AS "OBJECT_ID"
  , AI.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE                   AS TYPE
  , CASE  -- convert currency if necessary to reporting currency for invoice amount
         WHEN AI.INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE = '<%=REPORTING_CURRENCY%>' -- Reporting Currency
         THEN ROUND(AI.INVOICE_AMOUNT,2)
         WHEN RATE.CONVERSION_RATE IS NOT NULL 
         THEN ROUND( RATE.CONVERSION_RATE * AI.INVOICE_AMOUNT,2)
         WHEN LAST_RATE.CONVERSION_RATE IS NOT NULL 
         THEN ROUND( LAST_RATE.CONVERSION_RATE * AI.INVOICE_AMOUNT,2)
         ELSE 0
    END                                           AS AMOUNT --REPORTING_INVOICE_AMOUNT
  , AI.INVOICE_NUM                                AS NUMBER
  , AI.DESCRIPTION                                AS DESCRIPTION
  , AI.ORG_ID                                     AS ORGANIZATION
FROM AP_INVOICES_ALL AI
LEFT JOIN AP_SUPPLIERS PV ON 1=1
	AND AI.VENDOR_ID = PV.VENDOR_ID
LEFT JOIN AP_SUPPLIER_SITES_ALL VSA ON 1=1
	AND AI.VENDOR_SITE_ID = VSA.VENDOR_SITE_ID
LEFT JOIN (SELECT AID.INVOICE_ID
                 , COUNT(*) COUNT_UNAPPROVED_DISTRIBUTIONS
                 FROM AP_INVOICE_DISTRIBUTIONS_ALL AID
                 WHERE 1=1
                    AND NVL(AID.MATCH_STATUS_FLAG, 'Z') <> 'A'
                 GROUP BY AID.INVOICE_ID) UNAPP_DIS ON 1=1
	AND UNAPP_DIS.INVOICE_ID = AI.INVOICE_ID
LEFT JOIN (SELECT CONVERSION_TYPE 
              , FROM_CURRENCY 
              , TO_CURRENCY 
              , CONVERSION_DATE
              , CONVERSION_RATE
              FROM GL_DAILY_RATES 
              WHERE 1=1
              	AND CONVERSION_TYPE = '<%=CURRENCY_CONVERSION_TYPE%>' 
              	AND TO_CURRENCY = '<%=REPORTING_CURRENCY%>'
              ) RATE ON 1=1
	AND RATE.FROM_CURRENCY = AI.INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE
	AND TRUNC(RATE.CONVERSION_DATE) = TRUNC(NVL(AI.EXCHANGE_DATE, AI.CREATION_DATE)) -- if there is no foreign currency on the invoice, then the creation date is taken as rate date
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CONVERSION_TYPE 
            , FROM_CURRENCY 
            , TO_CURRENCY 
            , CONVERSION_DATE
            , CONVERSION_RATE 
            , RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY FROM_CURRENCY, TO_CURRENCY ORDER BY CONVERSION_DATE, CONVERSION_TYPE DESC) RNK
            FROM GL_DAILY_RATES
            WHERE 1=1
                AND CONVERSION_DATE < SYSDATE
            	AND TO_CURRENCY = '<%=REPORTING_CURRENCY%>'
            ) LAST_RATE ON 1=1
	AND LAST_RATE.FROM_CURRENCY = AI.INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE
	AND LAST_RATE.RNK = 1
LEFT JOIN  (SELECT PS.INVOICE_ID
            , MAX (PS.DUE_DATE) AS DUE_DATE
             FROM AP_PAYMENT_SCHEDULES_ALL PS
             GROUP BY PS.INVOICE_ID) MAX_DUE ON 1=1
	AND MAX_DUE.INVOICE_ID = AI.INVOICE_ID
LEFT JOIN AP_TEMP_XAIPA XAIPA ON 1=1
	AND XAIPA.INVOICE_ID = AI.INVOICE_ID
WHERE 1=1
);

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS AP_TEMP_XAIPA;

transformations.name: Create Table: _SU_AP_SUPPLIERS
transformations.statement:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS "_SU_AP_SUPPLIERS";

CREATE TABLE "_SU_AP_SUPPLIERS" AS(
SELECT 'SU_'||CAST(ASS.VENDOR_ID AS  VARCHAR(100)) AS "OBJECT_ID"
  , ASS.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE AS TYPE
  , ASS.SEGMENT1 AS NUMBER
  , ASS.VENDOR_NAME AS DESCRIPTION
  , HP.COUNTRY
FROM "AP_SUPPLIERS" ASS
LEFT JOIN HZ_PARTIES HP ON 1=1
  AND ASS.PARTY_ID = HP.PARTY_ID
WHERE 1=1
);

transformations.name: Create Table: _IH_AP_HOLDS_ALL
transformations.statement:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _IH_AP_HOLDS_ALL;

CREATE TABLE "_IH_AP_HOLDS_ALL" AS (
SELECT 'IH_'||CAST(AHA.HOLD_ID AS  VARCHAR(100)) AS "OBJECT_ID"
  , AHC.HOLD_TYPE AS TYPE
  , FLV.MEANING AS DESCRIPTION -- HOLD_NAME
FROM AP_HOLDS_ALL AHA
LEFT JOIN AP_HOLD_CODES AHC ON 1=1
	AND AHA.HOLD_LOOKUP_CODE = AHC.HOLD_LOOKUP_CODE
LEFT JOIN FND_LOOKUP_VALUES FLV ON 1=1
	AND FLV.LOOKUP_CODE = AHA.HOLD_LOOKUP_CODE
	AND FLV.LOOKUP_TYPE = 'HOLD CODE'
	AND FLV.VIEW_APPLICATION_ID = 200
	AND FLV.LANGUAGE = '<%=LANGUAGE%>'
WHERE 1=1
);

transformations.name: Create Table: _IP_AP_INVOICE_PAYMENTS_ALL
transformations.statement:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _IP_AP_INVOICE_PAYMENTS_ALL;

CREATE TABLE "_IP_AP_INVOICE_PAYMENTS_ALL" AS (
SELECT 'IP_'||CAST(AIPA.INVOICE_PAYMENT_ID AS  VARCHAR(100)) AS "OBJECT_ID"
, AIPA.INVOICE_PAYMENT_TYPE AS TYPE
, CASE WHEN PAY_GL.CURRENCY_CODE = '<%=REPORTING_CURRENCY%>'
       THEN ROUND( COALESCE(AIPA.EXCHANGE_RATE,1) * AIPA.AMOUNT ,2)
       WHEN PAY_RATE.CONVERSION_RATE IS NOT NULL 
       THEN ROUND( PAY_RATE.CONVERSION_RATE * COALESCE(AIPA.EXCHANGE_RATE,1) * AIPA.AMOUNT  ,2)
       WHEN PAY_LAST_RATE.CONVERSION_RATE IS NOT NULL 
       THEN ROUND( PAY_LAST_RATE.CONVERSION_RATE * COALESCE(AIPA.EXCHANGE_RATE,1) * AIPA.AMOUNT  ,2)
       ELSE 0
  END                       AS AMOUNT --REPORTING_AMOUNT
, AIPA.PAYMENT_NUM          AS NUMBER
FROM AP_INVOICE_PAYMENTS_ALL AIPA
JOIN AP_INVOICES_ALL AIA ON 1=1
	AND AIPA.INVOICE_ID = AIA.INVOICE_ID
JOIN GL_LEDGERS PAY_GL on 1=1
	AND AIA.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID = PAY_GL.LEDGER_ID
LEFT JOIN (   SELECT CONVERSION_TYPE 
                          , FROM_CURRENCY 
                          , TO_CURRENCY 
                          , CONVERSION_DATE
                          , CONVERSION_RATE
                          FROM GL_DAILY_RATES 
                          WHERE 1=1
                          	AND CONVERSION_TYPE = '<%=CURRENCY_CONVERSION_TYPE%>' 
                          	AND TO_CURRENCY = '<%=REPORTING_CURRENCY%>'  
                          ) PAY_RATE ON 1=1
	AND PAY_RATE.FROM_CURRENCY = PAY_GL.CURRENCY_CODE
	AND TRUNC(PAY_RATE.CONVERSION_DATE) = TRUNC(NVL(AIPA.EXCHANGE_DATE, AIPA.CREATION_DATE)) 
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CONVERSION_TYPE 
                        , FROM_CURRENCY 
                        , TO_CURRENCY 
                        , CONVERSION_DATE 
                        , CONVERSION_RATE 
                        , RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY CONVERSION_TYPE, FROM_CURRENCY, TO_CURRENCY ORDER BY CONVERSION_DATE, CONVERSION_TYPE DESC) RNK
                        FROM GL_DAILY_RATES
                        WHERE CONVERSION_DATE < SYSDATE
                       		AND CONVERSION_TYPE = '<%=CURRENCY_CONVERSION_TYPE%>' 
                       		AND TO_CURRENCY = '<%=REPORTING_CURRENCY%>'
                        ) PAY_LAST_RATE ON 1=1
	AND PAY_LAST_RATE.FROM_CURRENCY = PAY_GL.CURRENCY_CODE
	AND PAY_LAST_RATE.RNK = 1
	AND COALESCE(AIPA.REVERSAL_FLAG,'N') = 'N'
WHERE 1=1
);

transformations.name: Create Table: _CA_PO_HEADERS_ALL_CONTRACTS
transformations.statement:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS  "_CA_PO_HEADERS_ALL_CONTRACTS";

CREATE TABLE "_CA_PO_HEADERS_ALL_CONTRACTS" AS (
SELECT 'CA_'||CAST(PHA.PO_HEADER_ID AS  VARCHAR(100)) AS "OBJECT_ID"
  , PHA.TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE AS TYPE
  -- Amount
  , PHA.SEGMENT1 AS NUMBER
  , PHA.COMMENTS AS DESCRIPTION
  , PHA.ORG_ID AS ORGANIZATION
FROM PO_HEADERS_ALL PHA
WHERE 1=1
   AND PHA.TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE IN ('CONTRACT', 'BLANKET')
);

transformations.name: Create Table: _BA_IBY_EXT_BANK_ACCOUNTS
transformations.statement:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS "_BA_IBY_EXT_BANK_ACCOUNTS";

CREATE TABLE "_BA_IBY_EXT_BANK_ACCOUNTS" AS (
SELECT 'BA_'||CAST(IEBA.EXT_BANK_ACCOUNT_ID AS  VARCHAR(100)) AS "OBJECT_ID"
  , IEBA.BANK_ACCOUNT_NUM AS NUMBER
  , IEBA.BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME AS DESCRIPTION
  , HP.PARTY_NAME AS BANK
FROM IBY_EXT_BANK_ACCOUNTS IEBA
LEFT JOIN HZ_PARTIES HP ON 1=1
  AND IEBA.BANK_ID = HP.PARTY_ID
WHERE 1=1
);

FROM "_EVENTLOG"
WHERE 1=1
AND PRIMARY_OBJECT_ID LIKE 'IH%'
and activity_en not like 'Set Hold%'
and activity_en not like 'Release Hold%'
;

SELECT EL."EVENT_ID"
, '['||LISTAGG ( DISTINCT ''''||LEO."OBJECT_ID"||'''' USING PARAMETERS MAX_LENGTH=100000, separator=',' , ON_OVERFLOW='TRUNCATE')||']' AS "OBJECT_ID"
FROM "_EVENTLOG" EL
JOIN "_LINK_EVENT_ID_OBJECT_ID" LEO ON 1=1
    AND EL.EVENT_ID = LEO.EVENT_ID
WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY EL.EVENT_ID
;

CREATE TABLE _TEMP_PO AS ( SELECT LEO."EVENT_ID"
  , '['||LISTAGG ( DISTINCT ''''||CASE WHEN LEO."OBJECT_ID" LIKE 'PO%' THEN LEO."OBJECT_ID" END||'''' USING PARAMETERS MAX_LENGTH=100000, separator=',' , ON_OVERFLOW='TRUNCATE')||']' AS "OBJECT_ID"
  FROM "_LINK_EVENT_ID_OBJECT_ID" LEO
  GROUP BY LEO.EVENT_ID
);

CREATE TABLE _TEMP_PL AS ( SELECT LEO."EVENT_ID"
  , '['||LISTAGG ( DISTINCT ''''||CASE WHEN LEO."OBJECT_ID" LIKE 'PL%' THEN LEO."OBJECT_ID" END||'''' USING PARAMETERS MAX_LENGTH=100000, separator=',' , ON_OVERFLOW='TRUNCATE')||']' AS "OBJECT_ID"
  FROM "_LINK_EVENT_ID_OBJECT_ID" LEO
  GROUP BY LEO.EVENT_ID
);

CREATE TABLE _TEMP_PR AS ( SELECT LEO."EVENT_ID"
  , '['||LISTAGG ( DISTINCT ''''||CASE WHEN LEO."OBJECT_ID" LIKE 'PR%' THEN LEO."OBJECT_ID" END||'''' USING PARAMETERS MAX_LENGTH=100000, separator=',' , ON_OVERFLOW='TRUNCATE')||']' AS "OBJECT_ID"
  FROM "_LINK_EVENT_ID_OBJECT_ID" LEO
  GROUP BY LEO.EVENT_ID
);

CREATE TABLE _TEMP_AI AS ( SELECT LEO."EVENT_ID"
  , '['||LISTAGG ( DISTINCT ''''||CASE WHEN LEO."OBJECT_ID" LIKE 'AI%' THEN LEO."OBJECT_ID" END||'''' USING PARAMETERS MAX_LENGTH=100000, separator=',' , ON_OVERFLOW='TRUNCATE')||']' AS "OBJECT_ID"
  FROM "_LINK_EVENT_ID_OBJECT_ID" LEO
  GROUP BY LEO.EVENT_ID
);

CREATE TABLE _TEMP_GR AS ( SELECT LEO."EVENT_ID"
  , '['||LISTAGG ( DISTINCT ''''||CASE WHEN LEO."OBJECT_ID" LIKE 'GR%' THEN LEO."OBJECT_ID" END||'''' USING PARAMETERS MAX_LENGTH=100000, separator=',' , ON_OVERFLOW='TRUNCATE')||']' AS "OBJECT_ID"
  FROM "_LINK_EVENT_ID_OBJECT_ID" LEO
  GROUP BY LEO.EVENT_ID
);

CREATE TABLE _TEMP_SU AS ( SELECT LEO."EVENT_ID"
  , '['||LISTAGG ( DISTINCT ''''||CASE WHEN LEO."OBJECT_ID" LIKE 'SU%' THEN LEO."OBJECT_ID" END||'''' USING PARAMETERS MAX_LENGTH=100000, separator=',' , ON_OVERFLOW='TRUNCATE')||']' AS "OBJECT_ID"
  FROM "_LINK_EVENT_ID_OBJECT_ID" LEO
  GROUP BY LEO.EVENT_ID
);

CREATE TABLE _TEMP_IH AS ( SELECT LEO."EVENT_ID"
  , '['||LISTAGG ( DISTINCT ''''||CASE WHEN LEO."OBJECT_ID" LIKE 'IH%' THEN LEO."OBJECT_ID" END||'''' USING PARAMETERS MAX_LENGTH=100000, separator=',' , ON_OVERFLOW='TRUNCATE')||']' AS "OBJECT_ID"
  FROM "_LINK_EVENT_ID_OBJECT_ID" LEO
  GROUP BY LEO.EVENT_ID
);

CREATE TABLE _TEMP_IP AS ( SELECT LEO."EVENT_ID"
  , '['||LISTAGG ( DISTINCT ''''||CASE WHEN LEO."OBJECT_ID" LIKE 'IP%' THEN LEO."OBJECT_ID" END||'''' USING PARAMETERS MAX_LENGTH=100000, separator=',' , ON_OVERFLOW='TRUNCATE')||']' AS "OBJECT_ID"
  FROM "_LINK_EVENT_ID_OBJECT_ID" LEO
  GROUP BY LEO.EVENT_ID
);

SELECT EL."EVENT_ID" AS "ocel:eid"
, EL."ACTIVITY_EN" AS "ocel:activity"
, EL."EVENTTIME" AS "ocel:timestamp"
, _TEMP_PO."OBJECT_ID" AS "ocel:type:po"
, _TEMP_PL."OBJECT_ID" AS "ocel:type:pl"
, _TEMP_PR."OBJECT_ID" AS "ocel:type:pr"
, _TEMP_AI."OBJECT_ID" AS "ocel:type:ai"
, _TEMP_GR."OBJECT_ID" AS "ocel:type:gr"
, _TEMP_SU."OBJECT_ID" AS "ocel:type:su"
, _TEMP_IH."OBJECT_ID" AS "ocel:type:ih"
, _TEMP_IP."OBJECT_ID" AS "ocel:type:ip"
FROM "_EVENTLOG" EL
LEFT JOIN _TEMP_PO ON 1=1
    AND EL.EVENT_ID = _TEMP_PO.EVENT_ID
LEFT JOIN _TEMP_PL ON 1=1
    AND EL.EVENT_ID = _TEMP_PL.EVENT_ID
LEFT JOIN _TEMP_PR ON 1=1
    AND EL.EVENT_ID = _TEMP_PL.EVENT_ID
LEFT JOIN _TEMP_AI ON 1=1
    AND EL.EVENT_ID = _TEMP_PL.EVENT_ID
LEFT JOIN _TEMP_GR ON 1=1
    AND EL.EVENT_ID = _TEMP_PL.EVENT_ID
LEFT JOIN _TEMP_SU ON 1=1
    AND EL.EVENT_ID = _TEMP_PL.EVENT_ID
LEFT JOIN _TEMP_IH ON 1=1
    AND EL.EVENT_ID = _TEMP_PL.EVENT_ID
LEFT JOIN _TEMP_IP ON 1=1
    AND EL.EVENT_ID = _TEMP_PL.EVENT_ID
WHERE 1=1
;
